T03D3791:1b-1: a'a rya pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a aashta sa ha
T03D3791:1b-2: sri k'a by'a khy'a aa bhi sa ma y'a lam
T03D3791:1b-3: ka ra a'a ko ka n'a ma /
T03D3791:1b-5: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i bshad [dd] pa /
T03D3791:1b-6: mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba zhes bya ba /
T03D3791:1b-7: bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma /
T03D3791:1b-9: yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3791:1b-10: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3791:1b-11: po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
T03D3791:1b-12: phyag 'tshal lo // 'phags pa byams pa mi pham mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3791:1b-13: nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang //
T03D3791:1b-14: 'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang //
T03D3791:1b-15: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsung ba //
T03D3791:1b-16: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum de la phyag 'tshal //
T03D3791:1b-17: dngos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang mtshungs la mkhas rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar mchog tu //
T03D3791:1b-18: 'khor ba'i khongs nas nyes pa'i tshogs su kun du rgyal bar gyur pa'i lus can rnams //
T03D3791:2a-1: brtse ldan byams pa rang nyid kyis ni rnam pa kun tu bkri bya'i phyir //
T03D3791:2a-2: shes rab pha rol phyin tshul shin tu gsal bar rgyas bshad tshig ler byas pa mdzad //
T03D3791:2a-3: 'phags pa thogs med zhes bya grags pa gsal ldan shes rab ldan pa'i mchog gyur pas //
T03D3791:2a-4: de nyid rnam par nges par bshad pa rab tu sbyar mdzad des mdzad pa yi mthus //
T03D3791:2a-5: dngos dang dngos med rnam dbye'i phyogs la mkhas par shes pa'i mngon rlom gyis mtho ba //
T03D3791:2a-6: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis ni gzhung gi 'grel bar don bshad pa la gnas thob gyur //
T03D3791:2a-7: rnal 'byor goms pas don gyi de nyid bsrubs las 'jig rten 'das pa'i shes rab ldan //
T03D3791:2a-8: skyes gyur blo bzangs 'phags pa rnam grol sde yis 'brel ba la ni cher 'bad la //
T03D3791:2a-9: mtha' gcig skyes bur mi mthun phyogs lta zhi byed bstan bcos la mkhas rtogs ldan gang //
T03D3791:2a-10: rnam grol sde zhes tshig tu 'jig rten grags gzhan pa des ni rnam 'grel mdzad //
T03D3791:2a-11: de la blo nyams bdag 'dras sngon chad med cing brjod par nus min gang gi phyir //
T03D3791:2a-12: mkhas mchog rnams kyis nyin dang nyin lam dpyad dngos po'i tshul de gang zhig yod //
T03D3791:2a-13: ye shes thob byed chos kyi de nyid yul la bdag ni 'dod pa skyes gyur pa //
T03D3791:2a-14: des na dam pa'i don gyi yul mchog bshad pa byed la mngon par spro bar gyur //
T03D3791:2a-15: 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T03D3791:2a-16: thams cad kyi 'brel ba dang brjod par bya ba
T03D3791:2a-17: dang dgos ba dang dgos pa'i dgos pa rtogs pa
T03D3791:2a-18: sngon du seng ba'i 'jug pa ni /
T03D3791:2a-19: thams cad du don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom gyis yin te /
T03D3791:2a-20: de na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3791:2a-21: la 'brel ba la sogs pa rnams brjod par bya
T03D3791:2a-22: ba yin no // 'di ltar gal te 'di'i 'brel
T03D3791:2a-23: ba dang brjod par bya ba ma smras na de'i
T03D3791:2a-24: ba yin no // tshe / smyon tshig la sogs
T03D3791:2a-25: pa ltar 'brel pa med pa dang don med par
T03D3791:2a-26: dogs pas nyan pa la su yang 'jug par mi
T03D3791:2a-27: ba yin no // tshe / 'gyur ro // des
T03D3791:2a-28: na 'di'i 'brel pa dang brjod par bya ba ni
T03D3791:2a-29: gdon mi za bar brjod dgos so //
T03D3791:2a-30: de bzhin du 'brel ba dang brjod par bya ba
T03D3791:2a-31: yod du zin kyang bya ba rdzogs pa'i las la
T03D3791:2a-32: khyad par du sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa
T03D3791:2a-33: sgrub byed yin no zhes bya ba yang sgrub par
T03D3791:2a-34: byed pa'i tshul las 'das pa yin no zhes bya
T03D3791:2a-35: ba'i tshul gyis mdo sde gzhan dang ma 'brel ba
T03D3791:2b-0: @2b 'jug pa'i yan lag khyad par can gyi dgos
T03D3791:2b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde
T03D3791:2b-3: rin po che la dad pas rjes su 'brang bdag
T03D3791:2b-4: kyang mnyan pha tsam du yang gus pa mi skye'o
T03D3791:2b-5: // de bas na mdo sde la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3791:2b-6: dang por bya ba'i 'bras bu thun mong ma yin
T03D3791:2b-7: pa der gtogs pa'i dgos pa nyid brjod par bya'i
T03D3791:2b-8: / gzhan du gtogs pa ni ma yin te /
T03D3791:2b-9: gzhan du na ma 'brel ba brjod par 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:2b-10: mdo sde'i thog mar dgos pa brjod pa ni mdo
T03D3791:2b-11: sde la gzhan 'jug pa'i don du yin gyi phongs
T03D3791:2b-13: dgos pa'i ngag bstan pas gzhan dag mdo sde la 'jug par yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3791:2b-14: gal te der gtogs pa'i dgos pa nyid brjod kyi gzhan du gtogs pa ni ma yin te /
T03D3791:2b-15: gzhan gyi dgos pa brjod pas gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur pa ni su yang med do //
T03D3791:2b-16: mdo sde yang khyad par can gyi don gtsor ston pa'i tshig la brjod kyi /
T03D3791:2b-17: brjod par bya pa'am don ston pa'i nus pas stong pa'i sgra tsam la ni ma yin no //
T03D3791:2b-18: de pas na brjod par bya ba la sogs par
T03D3791:2b-19: gtogs pa ni brjod par phya ba ma yin no
T03D3791:2b-20: // bya ba'i rang bzhin yang dgos pa ma yin te /
T03D3791:2b-21: 'di ltar rang gi don du gyur pa'i brjod par
T03D3791:2b-22: bya ba ston par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya
T03D3791:2b-23: ba ni ngag thams cad la thun mong yin la
T03D3791:2b-24: / de yang shin tu grags pas dgos pa nyid du gzung bar 'os pa ma yin te /
T03D3791:2b-25: de la ni bstan bcos 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:2b-26: brjod par bya ba med pa nyid du dogs pa
T03D3791:2b-27: bsal ba'i don du nye bar bstan par bya ba
T03D3791:2b-29: ma yin te brjod par bya ba bstan pa nyid kyis dogs pa de bsal ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:2b-30: brjod par bya ba'i khyad par bstan par 'dod pas de nye bar bzung ba yang ma yin te /
T03D3791:2b-31: brjod par bya ba'i khyad par ston pa nyid kyis de bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:2b-32: bya ba'i 'bras bu de'i yang 'bras bur gyur pa'i
T03D3791:2b-33: dgos pa nye bar bstan par bya ba yin te
T03D3791:2b-34: / de med par bya ba'i 'bras bu tsam gyis mdo sde la 'jug pa mi srid pa'i phyir //
T03D3791:2b-35: 'di ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i gtso bo'i 'bras bu
T03D3791:2b-36: don du gnyer pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams
T03D3791:2b-38: rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu mi 'thad pa'i phyir /
T03D3791:3a-0: nad med pa'i sgrub byed ma tshar ba @3a * //
T03D3791:3a-1: med pa rjes su bsgrubs pas nad med pa thob pa dang 'dra bar /
T03D3791:3a-2: shes par gyur pa'i thabs goms par byed pa na
T03D3791:3a-3: rang gi thabs las byung ba'i 'bras bu ster bar
T03D3791:3a-4: byed pa des na thabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
T03D3791:3a-6: de pas na 'jug pa'i yan lag gi gtso bo
T03D3791:3a-7: nyid yin pas na dgos pa'i yang dgos pa kho
T03D3791:3a-8: na nges par bstan par bya'o //
T03D3791:3a-9: de yang thabs su gyur pa 'brel ba la sogs
T03D3791:3a-10: pa med par bstan par mi nus pas mdo sde'i
T03D3791:3a-11: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'i thabs bstan par bya ba'i
T03D3791:3a-12: don du 'brel ba la sogs pa brjod do //
T03D3791:3a-13: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa de yang /
T03D3791:3a-14: 'brel pa dang ni rjes mthun thabs //
T03D3791:3a-15: skyes bu'i don ni rjod byed ngag / yongs brtags dbang du byas pa ste //
T03D3791:3a-16: de las gzhan pa'i dbang byas min //
T03D3791:3a-17: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis 'brel ba dang rjes su
T03D3791:3a-18: mthun pa'i thabs dang ldan par bstan par bya ba
T03D3791:3a-19: yin no // de'i thabs rjes su bsgrub par mi nus pa yang ma yin te /
T03D3791:3a-20: gzhan du na rims nad sel bar byed pa'i 'jog
T03D3791:3a-21: po'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che rgyan gyi
T03D3791:3a-22: don du ltar su yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro
T03D3791:3a-23: // thug pa med pa yang ma yin te /
T03D3791:3a-24: 'di ltar skyes bu'i mngon par 'dod pa yongs su
T03D3791:3a-25: rdzogs par 'dod pa rgyun chad pa'i phyir de las
T03D3791:3a-26: gong du dgos pa gzhan tshol bar mi byed do
T03D3791:3a-27: // 'di'i 'brel ba la sogs pa gang yin zhe na /
T03D3791:3a-28: de la brjod par bya ste /
T03D3791:3a-29: re zhig 'brel ba ni dgos pa la sogs pa shig tu bstan par mi bya ste /
T03D3791:3a-31: gang zhig gang brjod du zin kyang rtogs par ma
T03D3791:3a-32: gyur pa de ni logs shig tu bzung par 'os
T03D3791:3a-33: te / dper na brjod par bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:3a-34: pa gang rung cig brjod pas cig shos rtogs par
T03D3791:3a-35: mi 'gyur pa lta bu yin na /
T03D3791:3a-36: dgos pa brjod pas 'brel ba ma brjod pa ni mi srid do //
T03D3791:3a-37: 'di ltar de rab tu ston pas ni bstan bcos
T03D3791:3a-38: dang dgos pa dag gi bsgrub par bya ba dang
T03D3791:3a-39: / sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bo'i phyir mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
T03D3791:3a-40: gzhan bla ma brgyud pa'i bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
T03D3791:3a-41: de ni don du gnyer ba 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:3a-42: bsgrub byad dang sgrub byed kyi ngo bo de yang dgos pa brjod pa nyid kyis bstan te /
T03D3791:3b-0: 'di ltar 'di ni 'di'i @3b dgos pa yin no zhes ston pas ni /
T03D3791:3b-1: 'di ni 'di'i sgrub byed yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T03D3791:3b-2: gang zhig gang sgrub par mi byed pa de'i dgos pa ni de ma yin te /
T03D3791:3b-3: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:3b-4: de bas na don gyi shugs kyis go bas 'di
T03D3791:3b-5: ni dgos pa brjod pa la sogs pa shig tu
T03D3791:3b-6: brjod par bya'o // kha cig na re chos rnam
T03D3791:3b-7: par 'byed pa'i don du gzhi thams cad bsdus pa
T03D3791:3b-8: brjod par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro //
T03D3791:3b-9: gzhan dag ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang bar bya
T03D3791:3b-10: ba'i phyir gnyen po'i phyogs ma lus ba bstan par
T03D3791:3b-11: bya ba yin no zhes zer ro //
T03D3791:3b-12: la la ni shes bya ma lus pa yongs su
T03D3791:3b-13: shes par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa ma lus pa
T03D3791:3b-14: bstan par bya ba yin no //
T03D3791:3b-16: de dag gsum char yang bden pa ma yin te /
T03D3791:3b-17: 'di ltar phyogs dang bo gzhi ma lus par bsdus
T03D3791:3b-18: pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3791:3b-19: pa 'dir / chos mngon pa'i sde snod la sogs
T03D3791:3b-20: par phung po dang khams dang skye mched bstan pas
T03D3791:3b-21: ma bsdus pa gang yin pa snga na med pa'i
T03D3791:3b-22: dngos po'i rigs de yod pa ma yin te /
T03D3791:3b-23: des na zlos pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:3b-24: gnyis pa gnyen po'i phyogs thams cad bsdus pa la
T03D3791:3b-25: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dngos po'i gang yin pa
T03D3791:3b-26: ma bsdus pas / nyan thos kyi lam la sogs
T03D3791:3b-27: pa gnyen po'i nyid du bsgom par bya'o zhes brjod
T03D3791:3b-28: ma bsdus pas / kyang / gang gi gnyen po yin zhes ma shes na /
T03D3791:3b-29: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs so sor nges par rtogs pa med pas /
T03D3791:3b-30: rtogs pa med pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:3b-31: gsum pa rnam pa ma lus par bsdus pa la yang /
T03D3791:3b-32: ci rnam pa bzhi las tha mi dad pa yin nam /
T03D3791:3b-33: 'on te tha dad pa yin zhes rnam par rtog pa gnyis so //
T03D3791:3b-34: gal te rnam par rtog pa dang po ltar na
T03D3791:3b-35: de'i tshe rnam pa'i thabs kyi gzhi nyid bsdus pa
T03D3791:3b-36: yin pas gzhi bsdus pa la 'byung ba'i nyes pa
T03D3791:3b-38: 'on te gnyis pa ltar de'i tshe rnam par rtog
T03D3791:3b-39: pas bskyed pa gzhi med pa'i rnam pa tsam du
T03D3791:3b-40: bsdus pas / brgyud pa tsam gzhi gang la yang 'jug par mi 'gyur pa'i phyir /
T03D3791:3b-41: rnam pa 'di bsgoms kyang skyes bu'i don du mi mkho ste /
T03D3791:3b-42: des na skyes bu'i don la dgos pa'i don mi ston pas ma bshad pa'i nyes pa yod do //
T03D3791:4a-0: de pas na ji skad bshad @4a * //
T03D3791:4a-1: ba'i don gsum char bsdus pas /
T03D3791:4a-2: phyogs re re las 'byung ba'i nyes pa mi 'thad pas /
T03D3791:4a-3: nyan thos ngang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T03D3791:4a-4: dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa
T03D3791:4a-5: bsdus pa / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3791:4a-6: la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi rim
T03D3791:4a-7: pa phyin ci ma log pa /
T03D3791:4a-8: mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i chos rnams thob par byed pa'i lam ma lus pa /
T03D3791:4a-9: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba thams
T03D3791:4a-10: cad la ston par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das thugs
T03D3791:4a-11: rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis shes rab kyi pha
T03D3791:4a-12: rol tu phyin pa las bstan par mdzad pa ni
T03D3791:4a-13: brjod par bya ba yin no //
T03D3791:4a-14: ji skad du bshad pa'i brjod par bya ba 'phags
T03D3791:4a-15: pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
T03D3791:4a-16: phrag brgya pa la sogs pa'i mdo'i don byang chub
T03D3791:4a-17: kyi sems dang gdams ngag la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i
T03D3791:4a-18: rang bzhin / gnas skabs brgyad kyi dbye ba phye ba thams cad /
T03D3791:4a-19: sems can mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba rnams kyis
T03D3791:4a-20: mdor bsdus nas bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i
T03D3791:4a-21: phyir / bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom ldan 'das ma brgyad stong ba bstan pa yin no //
T03D3791:4a-22: de pas na bstan par bya ba'i rgyud du gtogs pa /
T03D3791:4a-23: mdor bsdus pas don mtha' dag bde blag tu rtogs pa ni /
T03D3791:4a-24: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir na bya ba'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i dgos pa yin no //
T03D3791:4a-25: ji skad du bshad pa'i brjod par bya ba rnams
T03D3791:4a-26: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa'i lam
T03D3791:4a-27: / seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying
T03D3791:4a-28: po la sogs pa 'khor ba thog ma med pa
T03D3791:4a-29: nas dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i dug gis
T03D3791:4a-30: bsam pa'i rgyud ma rungs par byas ba /
T03D3791:4a-31: dngos po ma lus pa bdag med par bsgom pa
T03D3791:4a-32: goms par ma byas pa rnams kyis rtogs par ma
T03D3791:4a-33: gyur pa ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa las /
T03D3791:4a-34: thos pa'i shes pas bde blag tu nges par bzung ste /
T03D3791:4a-35: shin tu gsal bar nyams su myong bas skyes pa'i
T03D3791:4a-36: bag chags las byung ba dran pa'i shes pa la
T03D3791:4a-37: bzhag nas bsam pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis
T03D3791:4a-39: sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis bsgoms pa na /
T03D3791:4a-40: de'i phyir yang dag yang dag min //
T03D3791:4b-0: gang dag @4b shin tu goms gyur ba //
T03D3791:4b-1: sgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na //
T03D3791:4b-2: de gsal mi rtog blo 'bras bu //
T03D3791:4b-3: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa la brten nas /
T03D3791:4b-4: sbyin pa la sogs pa dge ba bsags pa dang ldan pa /
T03D3791:4b-5: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub pa'i blo bskyed pa rnams /
T03D3791:4b-6: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la sogs
T03D3791:4b-7: pa thob pa'i rim gyis rnam pa thams cad mngon
T03D3791:4b-8: sum du byed pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su
T03D3791:4b-9: mthun pa'i thabs dang ldan pa /
T03D3791:4b-10: bya ba'i 'bras bu'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i dgos pa yin no //
T03D3791:4b-11: de skad du yang mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las ;
T03D3791:4b-12: / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam //
T03D3791:4b-13: ston pas 'di las bshad pa gang //
T03D3791:4b-14: gzhan gyis myong bam yin te //
T03D3791:4b-15: chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi //
T03D3791:4b-16: mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas //
T03D3791:4b-17: blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur phyir //
T03D3791:4b-18: bde blag tu ni rtogs pa zhes //
T03D3791:4b-19: bya ba rtsom pa'i dgos pa yin //
T03D3791:4b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03D3791:4b-22: bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku dang /
T03D3791:4b-23: dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsrung ba la rnam pa
T03D3791:4b-24: thams cad du bdag por byas pa yin pa'i phyir
T03D3791:4b-25: dang / phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba la
T03D3791:4b-26: sogs pa las bstan pa gtad pa yin pa'i phyir
T03D3791:4b-27: dang / dang / gzhan rnams kyi khyad par brjod
T03D3791:4b-28: pa med pa'i phyir lcang lo can na bzhugs pas
T03D3791:4b-29: bcu'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos /
T03D3791:4b-30: 'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung pa'i phyir shes
T03D3791:4b-31: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde rin
T03D3791:4b-32: po che sdud par gsol ba 'debs pa /
T03D3791:4b-33: 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems
T03D3791:4b-34: dpa'i tshogs rnams la 'di skad ces bya ba la
T03D3791:4b-35: sogs pa gsungs pa yin no zhes sngon gyi slob

T03D3791:8a-11: par grol bas rnam pa thams cad du gnyi ga'i
T03D3791:8a-12: cha las rnam par grol ba dag ni sems shin
T03D3791:8a-14: shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba yin no //
T03D3791:8a-15: cang shes pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan dang
T03D3791:8a-16: smre sngags 'don pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa rnams
T03D3791:8a-17: dang bdag gis smad pa dang gzhan gyis smad pa

T03D3791:8a-20: tshigs su bcad pa med pa dang 'chi bas 'jigs pa rnams dang /
T03D3791:8a-21: rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa la sogs pa 'jig
T03D3791:8a-22: rten gyi chos brgyad kyis gos pa'i 'jigs pa dang
T03D3791:8a-23: / rang gi rtogs pa'i gegs su gyur pa mi
T03D3791:8a-24: shes pa dang the rtsom du gyur pa dang log
T03D3791:8a-25: par shes pa'i 'jigs pa rnams med pas /
T03D3791:8a-26: go rims bzhin du sdug bsngal ba dang ;

T03D3791:8a-31: chos rtogs pa dang ldan pas gtso bo chen por

T03D3791:8a-38: / bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa'o //
T03D3791:8a-39: sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags ba'i bden pa bzhi
T03D3791:8a-40: bo rtogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid ji lta ba'i yongs
T03D3791:8a-41: su shes par bya ba dang /
T03D3791:8a-43: mngon sum du bya ba dang /

T03D3791:8b-0: brtson @8b pa'i khur rnams rnam pa thams cad du
T03D3791:8b-1: spangs pa gang yin pa de dag ni khur por
T03D3791:8b-2: ba'o // rig pa dang ma rig pa thob pa
T03D3791:8b-3: dang spangs pa dag gis phan pa dang phan pa
T03D3791:8b-4: ma yin pa thob pa dang spang ba'i mtshan nyid
T03D3791:8b-5: can gyi rang gi don rnam pa gnyis po dang

T03D3791:8b-10: bar byed pa khong khro ba la sogs pa'i kun

T03D3791:8b-14: tu sbyor ba yongs su bzad pa'o //
T03D3791:8b-15: yang dag cing phyin ci ma log par kun nas shes pas na kun shes pa ste /

T03D3791:8b-17: des sems legs par rnam par grol zhing 'ching ba
T03D3791:8b-18: thams cad las shin tu rnam par grol ba gang
T03D3791:8b-19: yin pa de dag ni yang dag par kun shes

T03D3791:8b-22: nyid kyi sems can thams cad la rang dbang du
T03D3791:8b-23: gyur pa'i phyir / dbang yang yin la de ni dam pa'i pha rol te /
T03D3791:8b-24: rang gi rigs rab kyi mthar phyir pa thob ba
T03D3791:8b-25: la yang yin pas na de dag ni sems thams
T03D3791:8b-26: cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o
T03D3791:8b-27: // de bas na de lta bu'i dge slong dang zhes thams cad la gsum pa'i mthar sbyar ba'o //
T03D3791:8b-28: kha cig ni thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa'o //
T03D3791:8b-30: zag pa zad pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:8b-31: zag pa zad pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3791:8b-33: shin tu rnam par grol ba ni sems thams cad

T03D3791:8b-35: bya ba'i bar du snga ma snga ma'i rgyu phyi

T03D3791:8b-38: ba'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i khyad par ni brjod
T03D3791:8b-39: par mi bya'o zhes zer ro //
T03D3791:8b-40: rnam 'grel byed pa ni dgra rnams bcom pas na dgra bcom pa'o //

T03D3791:8b-42: yang zag pa zad par 'bad pa'i bdag nyid can
T03D3791:8b-43: gyi nyon mongs pa med pas na nyon mongs pa
T03D3791:8b-44: me pa'o // de ltar na tshig 'di dag gis
T03D3791:8b-45: ni nyes pa rnams shin tu spangs pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3791:8b-46: can gyi yon tan brjod nas /
T03D3791:9a-0: da ni gnyen po'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid can gyi @9a * //
T03D3791:9a-1: yon tan ni dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas brjod do //
T03D3791:9a-2: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa khyad par can
T03D3791:9a-3: gyi yon tan mngon par sgrub par byed pa mi
T03D3791:9a-4: slob pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dag dang ldan
T03D3791:9a-5: pa'i phyir 'jig rten gsum la phan 'dogs par nus
T03D3791:9a-6: pa nyid kyis sems can gyi don gyi khur la

T03D3791:9a-9: pa dang lta ba'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol
T03D3791:9a-10: bas go rims bzhin du sems shin tu rnam par

T03D3791:9a-13: par bya ba ji srid par 'gro bas na cang
T03D3791:9a-14: shes pa'o // nyon mongs pa'i g-yul las rnam bar rgyal ba'i phyir glang po chen po'o //
T03D3791:9a-15: yang rgyal bar bya ba med pas na bya ba byas pa'o //

T03D3791:9a-17: yang srid par skye ba'i sdug bsngal mi sogs pas na khur bor ba'o //
T03D3791:9a-18: mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du thob par byed pas /
T03D3791:9a-19: rang gi don rjes su thob pa'o //
T03D3791:9a-20: srid pa'i rgyu yang dag par bcom pas na srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa'o //
T03D3791:9a-21: mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam gyis rab kyi mthar
T03D3791:9a-22: thug pas na yang dag pa'i shes bas sems shin
T03D3791:9a-24: khyad par can gyi mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan la dbang thob pa nyid dang /

T03D3791:9a-27: tu son pa'o zhes de kho na ltar 'grel te
T03D3791:9a-28: snga ma'i rgyu ni phyi ma phyi ma yin no
T03D3791:9a-29: mthar thug pa brjod pa la yang khyad par brjod
T03D3791:9a-31: des na mthar phyin pa med pa'i nyes pa yod pa ma yin no zhes 'chad do //
T03D3791:9a-32: chos 'dzin pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ji skad du
T03D3791:9a-33: smos pa'i grangs kyi nang du gtogs su zin kyang
T03D3791:9a-34: / de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3791:9a-35: gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3791:9a-36: gang zag ces bya ba rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid bsgo bar bya ba dang /
T03D3791:9a-37: sgo bar byed pa'i ngo bo rtag pa ni mi
T03D3791:9a-38: 'thad pas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bag chags
T03D3791:9a-39: rnams kyis gang zhing mi rtag la /
T03D3791:9b-0: de @9b lta bu dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'gro
T03D3791:9b-1: ba len cing 'dzin par byed ba zhes bya ba'i
T03D3791:9b-2: nges ba'i tshig gi tshul gyis na rgyun nyid kyis
T03D3791:9b-4: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nye bar ston pa lhur len pa'i tshig phrad do //
T03D3791:9b-5: tshe 'dod par gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa ste /
T03D3791:9b-6: phan pa dang bde ba dang mchod pa rjod par byed pa'o //
T03D3791:9b-8: sangs rgyas kyi bsnyen bkur gyis dga' ba thob pa nyid kyis na kun dga' bo'o //
T03D3791:9b-9: des na tshe dang ldan pa 'phags pa kun dga'
T03D3791:9b-10: bo 'di ston par mdzad pa'i dus na rgyun du

T03D3791:9b-14: bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang /

T03D3791:9b-21: to mtshar khyad par don phyir dang //

T03D3791:9b-24: dge slong rgyu bar byed pa yin //

T03D3791:9b-30: / / rang gi ba'i nyan thos chen po'i 'khor brjod pa yin no //
T03D3791:9b-31: mdo sde rin chen zab mo ni //
T03D3791:9b-32: dpag med nyan pa'i srid pa yis //
T03D3791:9b-33: mtha' yas 'jig rten khams rnams su //

T03D3791:9b-36: de dag mang po 'ongs gyur te //
T03D3791:9b-37: des na mdo sde'i lung rnams su //
T03D3791:9b-38: rgyal ba'i sras rnams ma brjod do //
T03D3791:9b-39: zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
T03D3791:9b-40: tshig lhur len pa rgyas pa la dga' ba'i sems
T03D3791:9b-41: can rjes su gzung ba'i don du 'phags pa stong

T03D3791:9b-44: don thams cad bsdus nas 'phags pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bstan to //
T03D3791:9b-45: mgo smos pas go ba bsdus pa la dga' ba'i
T03D3791:9b-46: sems can la phan pa bskyed pa'i phyir de'i yang
T03D3791:10a-0: don thams cad du bsdus nas 'phags pa @10a *
T03D3791:10a-1: // brgyad stong pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3791:10a-2: des na de'i rjes su 'brangs nas chos mthong ba
T03D3791:10a-3: mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i dge slong dang dge
T03D3791:10a-4: slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor
T03D3791:10a-5: rnams dang / de bzhin du lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T03D3791:10a-6: rtsol ba dang bcas pas mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang /
T03D3791:10a-7: lhun gyis grub pas mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang /
T03D3791:10a-8: nges ba'i spyod pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /
T03D3791:10a-9: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams zhes de ltar
T03D3791:10a-10: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor ni tshad med
T03D3791:10a-12: zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
T03D3791:10a-13: de skad du yang slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos /
T03D3791:10a-14: de ltar ji skad bshad rnams kyis //
T03D3791:10a-15: brgyad stong 'di don ma tshang med //
T03D3791:10a-17: don de ji skad gsungs de nyid //

T03D3791:10a-20: ba zhan pa rnams 'khor la sogs pa med pa

T03D3791:10a-22: dang / 'dod pa chung ba la dgyes pa'i phyir
T03D3791:10a-23: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis chos kyi gdan bshams nas

T03D3791:10a-27: ba'i phyir shin tu rkyong ba la sogs pa'i nyes
T03D3791:10a-28: pa dang bral ba nyid kyis rdo rje'i skyil mo
T03D3791:10a-29: krung du sku drang por bzhugs nas /
T03D3791:10a-30: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T03D3791:10a-31: shangs kyi rtse mor spyan gtad de dran pa rtse
T03D3791:10a-32: gcig tu mngon du phyogs par mdzad nas ting nge
T03D3791:10a-33: 'dzin thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi
T03D3791:10a-34: rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
T03D3791:10a-36: de nas byams pa dang snying rje'i spyan dag gis
T03D3791:10a-37: 'jig rten 'di dag sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba la
T03D3791:10a-38: yang dag par gzigs te bstan pa 'di ni chung
T03D3791:10a-40: chen po'i dbye bas skal ba ji lta ba bzhin
T03D3791:10a-41: tu 'gro zhing sangs rgyas nyid kyi mthar thug par
T03D3791:10a-42: byed pa'i 'bras bu can yin no zhes gdul bya
T03D3791:10a-43: rnams kyis rtogs par mdzad pas /
T03D3791:10a-44: ci rigs par sku'i yan lag dang nyin lag rnams dang /
T03D3791:10a-45: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'od zer bye
T03D3791:10b-0: ba khrag khrig brgya @10b stong drug cu drug cu
T03D3791:10b-1: dang rang bzhin gyi 'od spro ba dang /
T03D3791:10b-2: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi
T03D3791:10b-3: bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad
T03D3791:10b-4: cing / sems can thams cad kyang bla na med
T03D3791:10b-5: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
T03D3791:10b-6: cing / par mdzad nas / stong gsum gyi stong

T03D3791:10b-18: seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /

T03D3791:10b-30: te / dga' ba dang rab tu dga' bas rang
T03D3791:10b-31: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song ba sngon
T03D3791:10b-32: du 'gro bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag

T03D3791:10b-39: lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab dang yang dag

T03D3791:11a-2: tshangs par spyad pa ni legs pa'o //
T03D3791:11a-3: srog chags su gyur pa rnams la mi 'tshe ba

T03D3791:11a-8: pa 'di ston par spyod do zhes ston par mdzad

T03D3791:24a-1: de tshe chos kyi rgyun la ni //

T03D3791:24a-3: ye shes yangs pa thob bya'i phyir //
T03D3791:24a-4: gdams ngag rgya chen rnyed par 'gyur //
T03D3791:24a-5: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03D3791:24a-6: de ltar 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang 'brel pa'i don gyi gdams ngag ni /
T03D3791:24a-7: 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung sngon du 'gro bas /
T03D3791:24a-8: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol pa yin te /
T03D3791:24a-9: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i don 'di la /
T03D3791:24a-10: shes rab kyi stobs kyis byang chub la dmigs pa'i phyir byang chub kyang yin la /
T03D3791:24a-11: snying rje chen po'i bsam pas sems can la dmigs
T03D3791:24a-12: pa'i phyir sems dpa' yang yin pas na byang chub
T03D3791:24a-14: dper na mi gtsang ba la dmigs pa'i ting nge
T03D3791:24a-15: 'dzin la mi gtsang ba zhes zer ba dang 'dra'o
T03D3791:24a-16: // gnas gzhan dag tu bshad pa'i byang chub sems
T03D3791:24a-17: dpa' zhes bya ba rnams kyang bsdu bar bya ba'i
T03D3791:24a-18: phyir bzlas te brjod pa yin no //
T03D3791:24a-19: chos gang gi tshig bla dgas zhes bya ba ni
T03D3791:24a-20: don dam par brtags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo
T03D3791:24a-21: nyid gang gi tshig bla dgas te /
T03D3791:24a-22: mngon du byas nas bstan pa lags /
T03D3791:24a-23: 'on kyang gang gi yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3791:24a-24: de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
T03D3791:24a-25: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag
T03D3791:24a-26: gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo zhes
T03D3791:24a-28: de kho na nyid du brtags pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3791:24a-29: ngo bo gdams par bya ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir
T03D3791:24a-30: ro // de lta na yang gdams ngag gi yul ni yod do zhe na /
T03D3791:24a-31: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3791:24a-32: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgrub
T03D3791:24a-33: pa la sogs pa chos rnam pa bcu'i rang bzhin
T03D3791:24a-34: te / 'di ltar gdams pa'i yul gyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03D3791:24a-35: stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
T03D3791:24a-36: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3791:24a-37: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3791:24a-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
T03D3791:24a-40: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3791:24a-41: dpa' chen pos ming de yang dag par rjes su
T03D3791:24b-0: ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba la @24b sogs pa
T03D3791:24b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:24b-3: chos gang la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas su byas pa'o //
T03D3791:24b-4: chos de ma 'tshal ba ni thos pas so //
T03D3791:24b-5: ma dmigs pa ni bsam pas so //
T03D3791:24b-6: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba ni bsgom bas so //
T03D3791:24b-7: yang na so sor nges pa'i don dang lhan cig nye pa'i rgyu med pas /
T03D3791:24b-8: rnam pa med pa'i shes pas ma 'tshal ba'o //
T03D3791:24b-9: dngos po med du zin kyang rmi lam la sogs
T03D3791:24b-10: par 'byung ba srid pas rnam pa dang bcas pas
T03D3791:24b-11: ma dmigs pa'o // de nyid kyis na gnyi ga
T03D3791:24b-12: yang dag par rjes sum mthong na shes rab kyi
T03D3791:24b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa la sogs pa
T03D3791:24b-14: rnam pa bcu po gang la dang po thob pa'i
T03D3791:24b-15: yon tan yongs su bsrung pa'i don gyis yongs su
T03D3791:24b-16: mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir bslab pas gdams par
T03D3791:24b-17: ma dmigs pa'o // bgyi zhing / de nas phyis
T03D3791:24b-18: ma thob pa'i yon tan thob par bya ba'i phyir
T03D3791:24b-19: rjes su bstan par bgyi ste /
T03D3791:24b-20: de kho na nyid du na rnam pa thams cad ma yin gyi /
T03D3791:24b-21: 'on kyang gdams ngag ni brjod pa'i kun rdzob tu yin no zhes don gyis 'phangs pa yin no //
T03D3791:24b-22: de ltar yang 'di skad du 'di nyid gdams pa
T03D3791:24b-23: dang rjes su bstan pa lags so zhes bya ba
T03D3791:24b-24: la sogs pa de ma thag tu 'chad par 'gyur
T03D3791:24b-25: ro // de yang yul gyi dbye bas rnam pa bcur shes par bya'o //
T03D3791:24b-26: de la byang chub kyi sems kyi rab tu dbye
T03D3791:24b-27: ba ji skad bshad pa sgrub pa la mi dmigs
T03D3791:24b-28: pa'i tshul gyis nyan thos la sogs pa dang /
T03D3791:24b-29: thun mong ma yin pa kun rdzob dang don dam
T03D3791:24b-30: pa'i bden pa las mi 'da' ba mi dmigs pa'i
T03D3791:24b-31: tshul gyis 'jug par bya'o zhes slob pa ni sgrub
T03D3791:24b-33: sdug bsngal la gzugs la sogs pa 'bras bur gyur pa'i stong ba nyid dang /
T03D3791:24b-34: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag de
T03D3791:24b-35: bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin
T03D3791:24b-36: gcig go zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3791:24b-37: kun 'byung ba la stong ba nyid dang rgyur gyur
T03D3791:24b-38: ba'i gzugs la sogs pa dag tha mi dad pa
T03D3791:24b-39: nyid kyis / gzugs la sogs pa ni kun 'byung pa dang 'gog pa dang /
T03D3791:24b-40: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i chos can ma yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3791:24b-41: 'gog pa la stong ba nyid skye ba dang 'gag pa dang /
T03D3791:25a-0: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang @25a * //
T03D3791:25a-1: nyams pa dang 'phel pa la sogs pa dang bral
T03D3791:25a-2: ba la ni gzugs med pa nas ma rig pa
T03D3791:25a-4: ma rig pa 'gag pa yang med /
T03D3791:25a-6: byang chub kyi bar du yang med do zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3791:25a-7: lam la sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ;
T03D3791:25a-8: bdag nyid dam nang stong ba la sogs pa ni
T03D3791:25a-9: phyi stong ba nyid la sogs pa dang lhan cig
T03D3791:25a-10: dang sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag phan
T03D3791:25a-11: tshun du ldan pa dang mi ldan pa ma yin
T03D3791:25a-12: pa nyid du bsgrub po zhes ston pa bden pa
T03D3791:25a-14: sangs rgyas la sangs rgyas dang byang chub dag mtshan
T03D3791:25a-15: nyid gcig la nyid kyis sangs rgyas su byed pa'i
T03D3791:25a-16: chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3791:25a-17: nyid mi dmigs pa la gzugs la sogs pa mi
T03D3791:25a-18: sbyor bas / dmigs par bya ba dang dmigs par
T03D3791:25a-19: byed pa mnyam pa nyid du shes ba zhes bya
T03D3791:25a-20: sbyor bas / ba dang / chos la thams cad
T03D3791:25a-21: mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis bsdus ba bzhi dang gnyen
T03D3791:25a-22: po dang rnam pa mtha' dag bsdus pas bsdus pa'i
T03D3791:25a-23: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid do zhes bya ba
T03D3791:25a-24: sbyor bas / ba dang / dang / dge 'dun
T03D3791:25a-25: la sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi khongs su gtogs pa
T03D3791:25a-26: nyid kyis dgra bcom pa ma gtogs pa 'bras bu
T03D3791:25a-27: la gnas pa dang zhugs pa'i bye brag gis /
T03D3791:25a-28: skyes bu chen po bdun po rang sangs rgyas dang
T03D3791:25a-29: lhan cig brgyad po dbang po rtul po la sogs
T03D3791:25a-30: pa'i bye brag gis grangs nyi shur chad pa byang
T03D3791:25a-31: chub sems dpa' 'phags pa slob pa phyir mi ldog
T03D3791:25a-32: pa rnams la skye ba med par 'jug par bya'o
T03D3791:25a-33: // zhes lung 'bogs pa dkon mchog gsum la gdams pa dang ;
T03D3791:25a-34: brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid kyis ji skad bshad pa'i
T03D3791:25a-35: don la nan tan du byed pa la lus la
T03D3791:25a-36: sogs pa'i bsod nams nyid la mngon par zhen par
T03D3791:25a-37: 'gyur pas / ma zhen pa la lus la sogs
T03D3791:25a-38: pa ngo bo nyid med par ston pa'i gdams pa
T03D3791:25a-39: 'gyur pas / dang / dus yun ring mo zhig
T03D3791:25a-40: tu goms par byas kyang 'dod pa'i don ma grub
T03D3791:25a-41: na dngang ba'i rang bzhin can yongs su skyo bar
T03D3791:25a-43: ngal ba med pa la sogs pa nas yang dag
T03D3791:25a-44: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rlom pa
T03D3791:25a-45: med pa nyid du bstan pa'i gdams pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-0: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs @25b
T03D3791:25b-1: pa la don re re'i phyir lam gyi lung mnos
T03D3791:25b-2: par bya na sems zhum par 'gyur pas /
T03D3791:25b-3: lam yongs su bzung ba la chos rnams rang bzhin
T03D3791:25b-4: gyis ma skyes pa nyid du slob pa'i gdams pa
T03D3791:25b-5: dang / sha'i spyan dang rnam par smin pa las byung pa lha'i dang /
T03D3791:25b-6: shes rab dang chos dang sangs rgyas kyi spyan grangs ji lta ba bzhin du /
T03D3791:25b-7: dngos po so sor nges pa thams cad dang /
T03D3791:25b-8: sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang /
T03D3791:25b-9: chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-10: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad rtogs pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-11: chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par
T03D3791:25b-12: byang chub pa'i yul can rnams de bzhin nyid du
T03D3791:25b-13: gcig pa nyid du bsgrub po //
T03D3791:25b-14: zhes slob pa spyan lnga la gdams pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-15: rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i rna ba dang /
T03D3791:25b-16: gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-17: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-18: mngon par 'du byed pa las byung ba lha'i mig dang zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa /
T03D3791:25b-19: rnams grangs bzhin du sa g-yo ba la sogs pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i sgra chung du dang cig shos thos pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-21: gzhan gyis sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa yongs su shes pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-22: rang dang gzhan gyi tshe rabs snga ma rjes su dran pa dang ;
T03D3791:25b-23: gzugs thams cad mthong ba dang /
T03D3791:25b-25: shes bya'i sgrib pa spong bar byed pa rnams gzod
T03D3791:25b-26: ma nas zhi ba nyid du rtogs par bya'o zhes
T03D3791:25b-27: ston pa mngon par shes pa drug la gdams pa
T03D3791:25b-28: dang / mthong ba'i lam la bden pa bzhis bsdus
T03D3791:25b-29: pa skad cig ma bcu drug gi ngo bo nyid
T03D3791:25b-30: dang / ; chos dang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-31: shes pa'i bdag nyid can la chos thams cad ngo
T03D3791:25b-32: bo nyid med par rtogs pas sgyu ma mkhan bzhin
T03D3791:25b-33: du thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i
T03D3791:25b-34: lus can gyi rnal 'byor pa des spang bar bya
T03D3791:25b-35: ba'i dngos po'i gnyen po nyid du rnam par sgom
T03D3791:25b-36: par byed do ; ; zhes ston pa mthong ba'i lam la gdams pa dang /
T03D3791:25b-37: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dag ngo bo nyid
T03D3791:25b-38: gcig ba nyid kyis phan tshun tha dad par gdags
T03D3791:25b-39: par mi nus pa bzhin du /
T03D3791:25b-40: ji skad du bshad pa'i mthong ba'i lam gyis mngon
T03D3791:25b-41: sum du byas pa'i dngos po dang tha mi dad
T03D3791:26a-2: mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam dag tha dad du
T03D3791:26a-3: gyur pa med pas bsgom pa'i lam mtshan nyid pa
T03D3791:26a-4: rnam par gzhag pa ni med kyi /
T03D3791:26a-5: 'on kyang de ni des spang bar bya ba'i dngos
T03D3791:26a-6: po'i gnyen po nyid du rten cing 'brel par 'byung
T03D3791:26a-7: ba'i chos nyid du rnam par bsgom pa'i lam la
T03D3791:26a-8: gdams pa ste / de ltar na gdams ngag bcu
T03D3791:26a-9: po 'di ni 'dir gzhung nyung ba nyid du 'dod
T03D3791:26a-10: pa nyid yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3791:26a-11: tu phyin pa'i sgras gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3791:26a-12: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
T03D3791:26a-13: gdams ngag re re'i gzhung gsal po kho nar bstan te /
T03D3791:26a-14: gzhung mangs kyis 'jigs pas shes par byed pa nyid du ni ma bris so //
T03D3791:26a-15: de lta bu'i gdams ngag des ji lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' la gdams par bya zhe na /
T03D3791:26a-16: bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T03D3791:26a-17: gal te zhes bya ba'i tshig phrad ni de ste zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3791:26a-18: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3791:26a-19: dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
T03D3791:26a-20: dmigs pa'o // gdams pa'i yul rnam bcur smras pa la sems mi 'gong zhing spa mi 'gong ste /
T03D3791:26a-21: gang gi phyir bag mi tsha ba ste mi rmongs pas so //
T03D3791:26a-22: de nyid kyis na dad pa nyid kyis chos la
T03D3791:26a-23: bsten pa yin pa'i phyir de dang por gnas med
T03D3791:26a-25: bstan pa la kun tu zhum zhing snyom las mi byed de /
T03D3791:26a-26: gang gi phyir bag 'khums par mi 'gyur pa ste /
T03D3791:26a-27: sngar ma'i ngo bor mi 'gyur bas so //
T03D3791:26a-28: de nyid kyis na shes rab dang ldan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3791:26a-29: de kho na nyid shes pa rnams kyi nang du kun tu 'jigs pas kun tu mi skrag go //
T03D3791:26a-30: nye bar bstan pa la de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi byed cing 'gyod par mi 'gyur te /
T03D3791:26a-31: gang gi phyir sems nyid ni yid de bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur pa ste /
T03D3791:26a-32: phyis sems bcom par mi 'gyur bas so //
T03D3791:26a-33: de nyid kyis na dad pa dang shes rab dag
T03D3791:26a-34: dang ldan pas tha mar kun tu skrag pa dang
T03D3791:26a-36: thams cad du ma nges pa'i skrag pas skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:26a-37: yang na smras pa la sogs pa'i dus su go
T03D3791:26a-38: rims bzhin du gzhung dang don gnyis ka nges par
T03D3791:26a-39: 'dzin pas / mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum bag mi tsha'o //
T03D3791:26b-1: gang gis mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang
T03D3791:26b-2: lung gi tshad ma dang mi 'gal bar rang gi
T03D3791:26b-3: yul gyi don yongs su bcad pa las /
T03D3791:26b-4: bag 'khums bar mi 'gyur 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid /
T03D3791:26b-5: bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur bas so //
T03D3791:26b-6: de nyid kyis na thog ma dang bar dang tha mar /
T03D3791:26b-9: kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
T03D3791:26b-10: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3791:26b-11: gang kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dbye ba la
T03D3791:26b-12: mkhas pas ji skad du bshad pa'i gdams ngag la
T03D3791:26b-13: sems zhum pa la sogs pa dang bral ba de'i
T03D3791:26b-14: de kho na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3791:26b-15: 'di nyid ces bya bas mtshan nyid ma smras par
T03D3791:26b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar
T03D3791:26b-17: 'dzin zhe na / brjod pa don gang smras pa
T03D3791:26b-18: la sogs pa na sems zhum pa la sogs par
T03D3791:26b-19: mi byed pa'i don de ni shes rab kyi pha
T03D3791:26b-20: rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa la sogs pa rnam
T03D3791:26b-21: pa bcu yin par brjod zin te /
T03D3791:26b-22: des na don gyis 'phangs pa bzung ba yin pas nyes pa med do //
T03D3791:26b-23: nye bar bsdu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T03D3791:26b-24: gal te byang chub sems dpa' de bshad ma thag
T03D3791:26b-25: pa'i gdams pas ji skad du bshad pa'i yul la
T03D3791:26b-26: gnas pa dang ldan par gyur na de'i tshe 'di
T03D3791:26b-27: nyid byang chub sems dpa' de'i don du gnyer ba'i
T03D3791:26b-28: don thob par byed pa'i nye bar bstan pa gdams
T03D3791:26b-29: pa dang rjes su bstan pa lags so zhes rig
T03D3791:26b-30: par bya'o // de ltar byas na byang chub kyi
T03D3791:26b-31: sems dang des 'phangs pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid
T03D3791:26b-32: kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3791:26b-33: sgrub pa gang yin pa yongs su mi ngal ba
T03D3791:26b-34: par bya'o // dang / theg pa gzhan gyis mi
T03D3791:26b-35: 'gro ba'i rgyu gang yin pa lam yongs su 'dzin
T03D3791:26b-36: par bya'o // dang / pa dang / gzhan gyi
T03D3791:26b-37: dring mi 'jog par 'gro ba nyid kyi rgyu gang
T03D3791:26b-39: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yongs
T03D3791:26b-40: su rdzogs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa mngon par shes
T03D3791:26b-41: pa drug dang mthar thug par 'gro ba'i rgyu gang
T03D3791:26b-42: yin pa mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam dag ste
T03D3791:26b-43: / de dag thams cad gdams ngag gi skabs su bstan te /
T03D3791:26b-44: 'di tsam kho nas don thams cad phun sum tshogs
T03D3791:26b-45: par 'gyur bas ji skad du bshad pa'i gdams ngag
T03D3791:26b-46: rnam pa bcu go rims bzhin du bstan pa yin
T03D3791:27a-1: sgrub dang bden pa rnams dang ni //
T03D3791:27a-2: sangs rgyas la sogs dkon mchog gsum //
T03D3791:27a-3: ma zhen yongs su mi ngal dang //
T03D3791:27a-4: lam ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang //
T03D3791:27a-5: spyan lnga dang ni mngon shes kyi //
T03D3791:27a-6: yon tan drug dang mthong lam dang //
T03D3791:27a-7: bsgom zhes bya ba gdams ngag ni //
T03D3791:27a-8: bcu yi bdag nyid shes par bya //
T03D3791:27a-10: de lta mod kyi dge 'dun dkon mchog gi skabs
T03D3791:27a-11: su byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rtul po la
T03D3791:27a-12: sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba 'di ltar gzung bar
T03D3791:27a-13: bya ste / 'og nas bshad pa'i lam shes pa
T03D3791:27a-14: nyid kyis bsdus pa mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig
T03D3791:27a-15: ma bcu drug la brten nas mthong ba'i lam gyi
T03D3791:27a-16: sems kyi skad cig ma bco lnga la dad pa

T03D3791:58a-5: zin pa dang bgrod par bya ba'i go rims dang
T03D3791:58a-6: bral ba'i phyir na ched du bya ba nyams par
T03D3791:58a-8: yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'di'i dmigs pa ci yin zhe na /
T03D3791:58a-9: kha cig ni stong pa nyid yin no zhes 'dod do //
T03D3791:58a-10: gzhan dag ni de chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid la dmigs par 'dod do //
T03D3791:58a-12: gang dang gang zhes pa yin pa de dang de

T03D3791:58a-15: dper na rmi lam du rta la sogs pa'i ngo

T03D3791:58a-17: // rtsod pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnam par mi
T03D3791:58a-18: rtog pa'i yid 'di yang shes pa yin no zhes
T03D3791:58a-19: bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
T03D3791:58a-20: dmigs pa mngon sum ma yin na //
T03D3791:58a-21: don mthong rab tu 'grub ma yin /
T03D3791:58a-22: zhes bya bas gtan tshigs ma grub pa ma yin la /
T03D3791:58a-23: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas 'gal ba ma yin no //
T03D3791:58a-24: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid
T03D3791:58a-25: du yod pa ni phyis 'gog par 'gyur ba'i phyir
T03D3791:58a-26: ma nges pa nyid kyang ma yin no //
T03D3791:58a-27: gang dmigs pa de ni med pa ma yin nam /
T03D3791:58a-28: dper na zla ba gnyis pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T03D3791:58a-29: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
T03D3791:58a-30: 'di yang dmigs pa yin pas med par 'gyur la
T03D3791:58a-31: / des na chos thams cad yod pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T03D3791:58a-33: gang gi phyir dngos po med pa skur pa 'debs
T03D3791:58a-34: pa'i mtha' lha spyin lta bur gyur pa de'i tshe
T03D3791:58a-35: sod par byed pa rang gi ngo bor sgro 'dogs
T03D3791:58a-36: pa'i mtha' mchod sbyin dang 'dra ba de stong pa
T03D3791:58a-37: nyid kyis bsad pa na slar 'byung pa ma yin
T03D3791:58a-38: pa'i phyir ro // gzhan yang dmigs pa ni de kho na nyid du mi 'grub kyi /
T03D3791:58a-39: kun rdzob tu yul du gnas pa nyams su myong
T03D3791:58a-40: ba'i mthar thug pa yin pas 'gal ba yin no
T03D3791:58a-41: zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i nyes
T03D3791:58a-43: stong ba nyid la dmigs pa'i phyogs la ye shes

T03D3791:58a-46: go rims bzhin du ye shes dang de'i stong pa
T03D3791:58a-47: nyid dag dngos po dang dngos po med pa nyid
T03D3791:58a-48: kyis phan tshun tha dad pa dang tha dad pa
T03D3791:58a-49: yin par rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:58b-0: me long lta bu'i @58b ye shes la sogs pa'i
T03D3791:58b-1: dbye bas ni brjod par bya ba mang du yod
T03D3791:58b-2: de ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par gzhag pa ni
T03D3791:58b-4: rab tu dbye ba ni zhar la brjod pa yin
T03D3791:58b-5: gyi da lta kho na ye shes kyi tshogs ma
T03D3791:58b-6: lus par rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
T03D3791:58b-7: mngon par rtogs pa'i go rims lhag ma ston pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:58b-8: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang shes par bya'o //
T03D3791:58b-9: ye shes la goms pa dang ldan pa la ni

T03D3791:58b-11: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas sems can gyi don
T03D3791:58b-12: byed pa las bsod nams 'byung pas na bsod nams
T03D3791:58b-13: kyi tshogs so // bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
T03D3791:58b-14: tshogs la goms par byas bas ni dngos po yongs
T03D3791:58b-15: su rtogs pa'i lam la sogs pa la 'bad pas
T03D3791:58b-17: lam dang ldan pa ni yi ge aa ni chos
T03D3791:58b-18: thams cad kyi sgo yin te gzod ma nas ma
T03D3791:58b-19: skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3791:58b-20: ni ri mor byed pa'i yi ge de des bskal
T03D3791:58b-21: ba mang por chos ston pa rgyu'i dran pa yongs
T03D3791:58b-22: su gtugs pa med par 'gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3791:58b-23: 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis na
T03D3791:58b-24: dran pas kyang gzhung dang don 'dzin pas na gzungs
T03D3791:58b-25: kyi tshogs so // de ltar thabs mkhas pa'i tshogs
T03D3791:58b-26: la sogs pa lnga po 'di dag stong phrag nyi
T03D3791:58b-27: shu lnga pa las theg pa chen po'i sgras rgya
T03D3791:58b-28: cher bstan pa yin pas som nyi mi bya'o ;
T03D3791:58b-29: / gzungs thob pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par nyid ni /
T03D3791:58b-30: rtogs pa phyi ma phyi ma'i rten byed pa'i tshul gyis dang /
T03D3791:58b-31: de la brten pa'i yon tan gyi gzhi yin pa'i
T03D3791:58b-32: tshul gyis sa yin no zhes sa'i tshogs bstan pa'i
T03D3791:58b-33: don du / rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du
T03D3791:58b-34: theg pa chen po la ji ltar yang dag par

T03D3791:58b-37: don du / / lan gsungs pa ni pha rol
T03D3791:58b-38: tu phyin pa rnams kyi sgo nas yang dag par
T03D3791:58b-40: sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa

T03D3791:58b-42: po rnams kyis rim gyis yang dag par 'jug go
T03D3791:58b-43: zhes 'bras bu bstan pa'i sgo nas sa'i tshogs brjod
T03D3791:58b-44: pa yin no // 'di skad ston te /
T03D3791:58b-45: de la gang gi tshe chos thams cad bdag med
T03D3791:58b-46: pa'o zhes bsgoms pas cha med pa nyid kyis chos
T03D3791:58b-47: kyi dbyings bdag nyid thams cad kyis rtogs su zin
T03D3791:58b-48: kyang des pa bskyed pa la ltos nas kun tu
T03D3791:59a-1: gyis so sor rtogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad ngo
T03D3791:59a-2: bo med par mngon sum du byed pa'i shes pa
T03D3791:59a-3: shin tu gsal par skye bar 'gyur pa de'i tshe
T03D3791:59a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la yang dag
T03D3791:59a-5: par zhugs pas mthong pa'i lam thob par 'gyur ro
T03D3791:59a-6: // 'dir yang 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang
T03D3791:59a-7: nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dang the tshom dang
T03D3791:59a-8: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta
T03D3791:59a-9: ba dang log par lta ba dang lta ba mchog
T03D3791:59a-10: tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog
T03D3791:59a-11: tu 'dzin pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams na bden pa
T03D3791:59a-12: bzhi'i dbye bas bzhi bcur 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:59a-13: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su
T03D3791:59a-14: ni de dag bden pa bzhi'i mthong bas spang bar
T03D3791:59a-15: bya ba khong khro ba brgyad bton na bdun cu
T03D3791:59a-16: rtsa gnyis so // spyir bsdom sa na mthong bas
T03D3791:59a-17: spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa brgya rtsa bcu
T03D3791:59a-18: rtsa gnyis so // gnyis spong ste / bden pa
T03D3791:59a-19: rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa ni gcig pa'i phyir
T03D3791:59a-20: rtsa gnyis so // gnyis spong ste / ro //
T03D3791:59a-21: de bas na dang po'i skad cig ma dang po
T03D3791:59a-22: ni mthong ba'i lam yin no //
T03D3791:59a-23: de las gzhan pa skad cig ma gnyis pa la
T03D3791:59a-24: sogs pa nas rdo rje lta bur brjod pa'i bar
T03D3791:59a-25: chad med pa'i lam gang las de ma thag tu
T03D3791:59a-26: sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'od 'thob pa'i bar 'di
T03D3791:59a-27: dag ni mchog gi don la sogs par chos kyi
T03D3791:59a-28: dbyings so sor rtogs pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam yin
T03D3791:59a-29: par bshad do // de la yang nyon mongs pa bcu drug ci rigs par rim gyis spong ngo //
T03D3791:59a-35: mthar 'dzin par lta ba ste 'dod par spyod pa drug go //
T03D3791:59a-36: de dag nyid pas zhe sdang bton na gzugs dang gzugs med par spyod pa bcu yin no //
T03D3791:59a-37: mthong pa dang bsgom pa'i lam la yongs su sbyong
T03D3791:59a-38: ba'i chos kyi dbye bas rab tu dga' ba la
T03D3791:59a-39: sogs pa'i sa bcur rnam par gzhag go //
T03D3791:59a-40: de la yang sa gang gi yongs su spyod bar
T03D3791:59a-41: gyur pa'i chos gang yin ba rnams ji srid ma
T03D3791:59a-42: rdzogs pa de srid du ni sa de yin la
T03D3791:59a-43: / yongs su rdzogs nas ni sa gzhan yin par shes par bya'o //
T03D3791:59a-44: de la yongs su spyod par gyur pa'i chos 'di
T03D3791:59a-45: rnams ni stong phrag nyi shu lnga ba las bstan
T03D3791:59a-46: to // 'di lta ste dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa dang /
T03D3791:59a-47: sems can gyi don du theg pa chen po'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T03D3791:59b-0: @59b tshad med pa bzhi sgrub pa dang /
T03D3791:59b-1: rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /
T03D3791:59b-2: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyes par byed pa dang /
T03D3791:59b-3: nyan thos kyi theg pa la ltos pa med pas
T03D3791:59b-4: dam pa'i chos kyi dmigs pa ma lus pa yongs
T03D3791:59b-6: rtag tu khyim gyi gnas la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /
T03D3791:59b-7: rnam pa thams cad du bla na med pa'i sangs
T03D3791:59b-8: rgyas kyi sku yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral
T03D3791:59b-9: pa dang / mdo la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos
T03D3791:59b-10: ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu ston pa dang

T03D3791:59b-12: rgyu'i khyad par yongs su sbyong pa'i chos bcu po

T03D3791:59b-14: bya ba yin pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid mi dmigs

T03D3791:59b-16: su sbyong ba rnams kho nas dang po sngon ma
T03D3791:59b-17: byung ba'i chos kyi de kho na nyid rtogs pas
T03D3791:59b-18: rab tu dga' ba 'thob pa'i phyir sa dang po
T03D3791:59b-19: rab tu dga' ba thob pa yin no //
T03D3791:59b-21: yongs su sbyong pa rnam bcu yis //
T03D3791:59b-23: bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang //
T03D3791:59b-24: sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid //

T03D3791:59b-26: dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang //
T03D3791:59b-27: rtag tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang //
T03D3791:59b-28: sangs rgyas bkur 'dod dga' ba dang //
T03D3791:59b-29: chos ston pa dang bden pa yi //
T03D3791:59b-30: tshig ni bcu pa yin par 'dod //
T03D3791:59b-31: 'di ga rang bzhin mi dmigs pas //
T03D3791:59b-32: yong su spyor par shes par bya //
T03D3791:59b-34: dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang /
T03D3791:59b-35: sems can gyi don bya ba dang sdom pa'i tshul
T03D3791:59b-36: khrims rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa
T03D3791:59b-37: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa
T03D3791:59b-39: gzhan gyi phan pa byas pa chud mi gzan pa dang /

T03D3791:59b-41: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la sogs pa la 'gyod pa med pa dang /
T03D3791:59b-42: sems can gcig gi don du yang dus ring bor
T03D3791:59b-43: dmyal pa la sogs par gnas par spro pa dang
T03D3791:59b-44: / skye bo thams cad la 'dud pa nyid dang /

T03D3791:59b-46: las gzhan med par sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha
T03D3791:59b-47: rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhing spro ba ste

T03D3791:60a-2: byas pa'i khyad par can gyi chos rnam pa brgyad
T03D3791:60a-3: kyis tshul khrims 'tshal pa'i dri ma thams cad dang
T03D3791:60a-4: bral pas sa gnyis pa dri ma med pa thob
T03D3791:60a-5: pa yin no // de skad du yang /
T03D3791:60a-6: tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod //
T03D3791:60a-7: rab tu dga' dang snying brtse che ;
T03D3791:60a-8: / bkur sti bla ma la gus nyan //
T03D3791:60a-9: brgyad pa sbyin la sogs la brtson //
T03D3791:60a-10: zhes bya ba gzungs pa yin no //
T03D3791:60a-11: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i bsam pa dang /
T03D3791:60a-12: rnyed pa la sogs pa la mi ltos par dam pa'i chos rab tu ston pa dang /
T03D3791:60a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i
T03D3791:60a-14: chos rnams de nyid du yongs su bsngo ba dang
T03D3791:60a-15: / sems can gyi don bya ba'i phir nam yang sems skyo ba med pa dang /
T03D3791:60a-16: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed
T03D3791:60a-17: pa la sogs par rang dang gzhan la ltos na
T03D3791:60a-18: ngo tsha dang khrel yod pa ste de lta bu'i
T03D3791:60a-19: yongs su sbyong ba rnam pa lnga po snga ma
T03D3791:60a-20: bzhin du ngo bo nyid du mi rtog par yongs

T03D3791:60a-23: byed pa'i phyir sa gsum pa 'od byed pa rtogs
T03D3791:60a-24: pa yin no // de skad du yang /
T03D3791:60a-25: thos pas mi ngoms nyid dang ni //
T03D3791:60a-26: zang zing med par chos sbyin dang //
T03D3791:60a-27: sangs rgyas zhing kun sbyong ba dang //
T03D3791:60a-28: 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo dang //
T03D3791:60a-29: ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba //
T03D3791:60a-30: rlom med bdag nyid de rnam lnga //

T03D3791:60a-35: chos zab mo la bzod pa'i nges par rtog pa

T03D3791:60a-38: 'dod pa la sems kyang mi bskyed pa dang /
T03D3791:60a-39: chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /
T03D3791:60a-40: rang gi lus la sogs par yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nyid dang /
T03D3791:60a-41: dge ba'i chos la dmigs pa la sems mi zhum pa dang /
T03D3791:60a-42: dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3791:60a-43: de lta bu'i yongs su sbyong ba snga ma lta
T03D3791:60a-44: bu rnam pa bcus nyon mongs pa'i bud shing ma
T03D3791:60a-45: lus pa sreg pa'i 'bar ba dang nye bar ldan
T03D3791:60b-0: pa'i phyir sa @60b bzhi ba 'od 'phro ba can
T03D3791:60b-3: nags gnas 'dod chung chog shes dang //
T03D3791:60b-4: sbyangs pa yang dag sdom bsten dang //
T03D3791:60b-5: bslab pa yongs su mi gtong dang //
T03D3791:60b-6: 'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang //
T03D3791:60b-7: mya ngan 'das dang bdog kun gtong //
T03D3791:60b-8: mi zhum pa dang lta ba med //
T03D3791:60b-9: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3791:60b-10: rnyed pa la sogs pa'i don du khyim pa dang rab tu byung pa dang 'grogs pa dang /

T03D3791:60b-12: skye bo mang por 'gro ba la sogs pa dang /
T03D3791:60b-13: bdag la bstod pa dang gzhan la smod pa dang /

T03D3791:60b-16: dge ba dang mi dge ba pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3791:60b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas
T03D3791:60b-18: la sogs pa'i blo gros ngan pa dang /
T03D3791:60b-19: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mngon du phyogs par byed pa ste /

T03D3791:60b-31: rlom pas khengs dang phyin ci log //
T03D3791:60b-32: blo ngan dang ni nyon mongs bzod //
T03D3791:60b-33: bcu po 'di ni rnams spangs na //
T03D3791:60b-34: sa lnga ba ni yang dag 'thob //
T03D3791:60b-36: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3791:60b-37: drug yongs su rdzogs pas nyan thos dang rang sangs
T03D3791:60b-38: rgyas la mngon par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3791:60b-39: ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa la skrag pa'i sems dang /

T03D3791:60b-41: bdog pa thams cad rang gi dang gis gtong bar zhugs pa la mi dga' ba dang /
T03D3791:60b-42: dbul pas slong mo ba'i skye bo spong ba'i sems 'dor ba ste /
T03D3791:60b-43: de lta bu'i snga ma bzhin du yongs su sbyor

T03D3791:60b-45: mngon sum du gyur pas sa drug pa mngon du

T03D3791:73b-28: ba ni mog mog por dri ma can du mdzad

T03D3791:73b-30: de nas bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag ba ste /
T03D3791:73b-31: de ltar mog mog bor mdzad pas 'jig rten skyong
T03D3791:73b-32: ba la sogs pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal bsal ba'i
T03D3791:73b-33: rjes thogs la'o // 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni mngon du gyur pa'i tshul lo //
T03D3791:73b-34: rab 'byor las zhes bya ba ni thad nas so //
T03D3791:73b-35: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya
T03D3791:73b-36: ba ni lam shes pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can
T03D3791:73b-37: no // gang dang 'bral ba zhe na /
T03D3791:73b-38: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3791:73b-39: nye bar bstan pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:73b-40: pa la mnyan pa'i skabs su gzhung 'dzin pa'i phyir
T03D3791:73b-41: slob pa ni nye bar bstan pa'o //
T03D3791:73b-42: bsam pa'i skabs su nges par gzung ba'i don mi brjed pa'i phyir gdams pa'o //
T03D3791:74a-1: pa'i skabs su sngon med pa skyed pa'i phyir rjes su bstan pa'o //
T03D3791:74a-2: nyan par 'dod na zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i shes pas nges par bya 'dod pa'o //
T03D3791:74a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di dag ji ltar nyan par 'dod ce na /
T03D3791:74a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:74a-5: gnas par bgyi ba la sogs pa tshig gsum ni
T03D3791:74a-6: go rims bzhin du mnyan pa la sogs pa'i gnas
T03D3791:74a-8: de ltar gsol ba btab ba dang /
T03D3791:74a-9: 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis mngon pa'i nga rgyal med
T03D3791:74a-10: pa nyid dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni
T03D3791:74a-11: lam shes pa nyid rtogs pa'i skal ba dang ldan
T03D3791:74a-12: pa yin no zhes bya ba'i yul nges pa bstan
T03D3791:74a-13: pa'i sgo nas / koo shi ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T03D3791:74a-14: gang gi phyir de ltar nyan par 'dod pa'i rgyu de'i phyir bstan par bya zhing bshad par bya'o //
T03D3791:74a-15: sems zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid dang snying
T03D3791:74a-16: rje'i snying po can no zhes bya bar bsams pa'o
T03D3791:74a-17: // theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa ni dgongs
T03D3791:74a-18: pa can yin gyi mtshan nyid pa ni ma yin
T03D3791:74a-19: no zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis skye bo thams cad
T03D3791:74a-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3791:74a-21: chub kyi mthar thug pa kho na yin no //
T03D3791:74a-22: de'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba dang cig shos
T03D3791:74a-23: kyi rnal 'byor bas kyang sangs rgyas nyid thob par
T03D3791:74a-24: bya ba'i phyir lam shes pa nyid bsgom par bya
T03D3791:74a-25: ba yin no // zhes khyad par bstan pa'i phyir
T03D3791:74a-26: nyan thos kyi theg pa la sogs par zhugs pa
T03D3791:74a-27: rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T03D3791:74a-28: byang chub kyi snod du ma gyur ba nyid kyis
T03D3791:74a-29: rigs ma nges pa rnams thog ma nyid du byang
T03D3791:74a-30: chub chen por drang bar bya ba'i don dang /
T03D3791:74a-31: rab tu zhugs pa gzhan rnams kyang yang dag par
T03D3791:74a-32: gzung ba'i don yin no snyam pas dgongs pa can
T03D3791:74a-33: gyi tshig brjod pa ni gang dag zhes bya ba
T03D3791:74a-34: la sogs pa'o // zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges
T03D3791:74a-35: bar bzung ba ste gang dag yang dag pa nyid
T03D3791:74a-36: du nges pa la zhugs shing rang gi nyan thos
T03D3791:74a-37: kyi mthong ba la sogs pa'i lam la zhugs pa
T03D3791:74a-38: de dag ni 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas grub
T03D3791:74a-39: par shog / ces bla na med pa yang dag
T03D3791:74a-40: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skal
T03D3791:74a-41: ba med cing snod du ma gyur pa yin no
T03D3791:74a-42: la sogs pa'o // // gang du byis pa'i skye
T03D3791:74b-0: bo thams cad kyis kyang nus na 'phags @74b pa'i
T03D3791:74b-1: lam rtogs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis ji ltar mi
T03D3791:74b-2: nus snyam pa'i dogs pa de ci'i phyir zhen zhes
T03D3791:74b-4: de dag gis ni 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi mtshams bcad pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:74b-5: gang gi phyir khams gsum par skye bar byed pa'i
T03D3791:74b-6: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rang gi lam gyis ma
T03D3791:74b-7: lus par bsregs pas nyan thos chen po de dag
T03D3791:74b-9: skye ba rjes su 'brel pa las mtshams bcad pa
T03D3791:74b-10: zhes bya ba mi skye ba'i nges pa byas pa
T03D3791:74b-11: de bas na de dag yang dang yang du ste
T03D3791:74b-12: / bskyar zhing 'khor bar skye ba len pa yod ba ma yin no //
T03D3791:74b-13: de'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T03D3791:74b-14: pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med
T03D3791:74b-15: do // zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03D3791:74b-17: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T03D3791:74b-18: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
T03D3791:74b-19: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T03D3791:74b-20: mya ngan mi 'da' byed bar nus //
T03D3791:74b-21: zhes gsungs pas yang skye ba blangs par gyur na
T03D3791:74b-22: ni sbyin pa la sogs pas sems can gyi don
T03D3791:74b-24: byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa de bzhin
T03D3791:74b-25: gshegs pa'i go 'phang thob par byed ba nye bar
T03D3791:74b-27: de bas na nyan thos chen po rnams kyis ni
T03D3791:74b-28: nyon mongs pa bcad pa nyid kyis yang skye ba
T03D3791:74b-29: zhes bya ba rtsa ba'i rgyu ldog pa'i phyir de
T03D3791:74b-30: lta bu'i sems kyi rin po che 'bras bu'i bdag
T03D3791:74b-31: nyid can skyed bar mi nus te /
T03D3791:74b-32: rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:74b-33: yang byis pa'i skye bo ni ji skad du bshad
T03D3791:74b-34: pa'i rgyu ma tshang ba med pas nus pa nyid
T03D3791:74b-35: yin no // zhes brjod pa yin no //
T03D3791:74b-36: tshig 'di ni rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas ji ltar na dgongs pa can yin zhe na /
T03D3791:74b-37: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
T03D3791:74b-38: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'i tshig gi phrad ni gnas
T03D3791:74b-39: skabs kyis de nas kyi sgra'i don la 'jug go
T03D3791:74b-40: // de dag gis zhes bya ba ni nyan thos chen po rnams kyis so //
T03D3791:74b-41: rjes su yi rang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni
T03D3791:74b-42: 'og nas bshad pa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i yid
T03D3791:74b-43: la byed pas rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
T03D3791:74b-44: khyed ci zhig la rjes su yi rang zhe na /
T03D3791:74b-45: gal te bla na med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:74b-46: gal te nyan thos chen po rnams bla na med
T03D3791:74b-47: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
T03D3791:75a-1: de la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03D3791:75a-2: khyed spangs nas ji ltar rjes su yi rang zhe na /
T03D3791:75a-3: de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3791:75a-4: gal te kho bos gdul bya'i khyad par la ltos
T03D3791:75a-5: te sngar dgongs pa can gyi tshig smras par gyur
T03D3791:75a-6: pa de lta na yang nyan thos rnams kyi dge
T03D3791:75a-7: ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems las byung ba'i
T03D3791:75a-8: 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba nyid la bar chod de
T03D3791:75a-9: mi srid pa de nyid du byas pas gegs su
T03D3791:75a-11: ji ltar mi byed ce na /
T03D3791:75a-12: khyad par du 'phags pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:75a-13: gang gi phyir khyad par du 'phags ba'i dge ba'i
T03D3791:75a-14: bshes gnyen la sogs pa rnams las shin tu ches
T03D3791:75a-15: khyad par du 'phags pa kho na'i byang chub kyi
T03D3791:75a-16: sems la sogs pa'i chos rnams lhag par dmigs par
T03D3791:75a-18: yang srid ba'i nyon mongs pa bsregs pa'i nyan thos
T03D3791:75a-19: dang rang rgyal ba rnams kyang 'gro ba de dang
T03D3791:75a-20: der skye bar ji ltar mi 'gal zhes ni brjod
T03D3791:75a-22: gang gi phyir gang zhig skye bo gzhan gyis dkri
T03D3791:75a-23: bar bya ba ma yin pa mngon par dga' ba
T03D3791:75a-24: sngon du btang nas dman pa'i gnas yongs su 'dzin
T03D3791:75a-25: pa de ni bdag la chags pa dang ldan pas
T03D3791:75a-26: sdug bsngal dang bde ba 'dor ba dang thob par
T03D3791:75a-27: 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
T03D3791:75a-28: dper na bud med kyi ro yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'dod pa can bzhin no //
T03D3791:75a-29: de bzhin du mngal gyi gnas 'dzin pa 'di yang
T03D3791:75a-30: skye ba'i dbang phyug la sogs pas byin gyis ma
T03D3791:75a-31: brlabs par mngon par dga' ba sngon du 'gro bas
T03D3791:75a-32: dman pa'i gnas yongs su 'dzin pa yin no //
T03D3791:75a-33: zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis khams
T03D3791:75a-34: gsum pa bskyed par bya ba la nyon mongs pa
T03D3791:75a-35: rnams kyi nus pa bsgrubs pa yin no //
T03D3791:75a-36: nyan thos chen po phung po dang bcas pa dang /
T03D3791:75a-37: phung po med ba'i ming can gyi byang chub gnyis
T03D3791:75a-38: thob nas snying rje chen po dang shes rab dang
T03D3791:75a-39: bral bas srid pa las skrag pa'i yid can mya
T03D3791:75a-40: ngan las 'das pa med kyang sngon gyi shugs kyis
T03D3791:75a-41: 'phangs pa'i tshe zad ba na mar me shi ba
T03D3791:75a-42: lta bur mya ngan las 'das pa zhes ming du
T03D3791:75a-43: byas pa / khams gsum pa'i skye ba las 'das
T03D3791:75a-44: pa rnams ni 'chi 'pho ba'i sems kyi de ma
T03D3791:75a-45: thag tu zag pa med pa'i dbyings la mnyam par
T03D3791:75b-0: bzhag bzhin pa kho @75b nar yongs su dag pa'i
T03D3791:75b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su padma'i sbubs su skye'o
T03D3791:75b-2: byas pa / // de nas de dag 'od dpag
T03D3791:75b-3: med la sogs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T03D3791:75b-4: rgyas kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis nyon mongs
T03D3791:75b-5: pa can ma yin pa'i mun pa bsal ba'i don
T03D3791:75b-7: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas thar pa'i gnas skabs
T03D3791:75b-8: su dmyal ba la sogs par rgyu ba bzhin du
T03D3791:75b-9: 'gro bar 'gro ba'i rim gyis byang chub kyi tshogs
T03D3791:75b-10: bsags nas 'jig rten gyi bla mar 'gyur ro zhes
T03D3791:75b-11: lung las nges pa yin no //
T03D3791:75b-12: des na rgyu yang las dang srid pa'i nyon mongs
T03D3791:75b-13: pa log pas 'bras bu khams gsum pa'i skye ba
T03D3791:75b-15: zag pa med pa'i dbyings su skye ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gal /
T03D3791:75b-16: de bas na theg pa thams cad ni rnam pa
T03D3791:75b-17: thams cad du theg pa chen por gzhol bar bshad
T03D3791:75b-18: pa nyid rigs pa yin par shes so //
T03D3791:75b-19: de lta na yang dam pa'i chos padma dkar po
T03D3791:75b-20: dang bden pa po'i le'u la sogs pa las gsungs
T03D3791:75b-21: ba legs par drangs par 'gyur te /
T03D3791:75b-22: sh'a ri'i bu khyed ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang
T03D3791:75b-23: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes
T03D3791:75b-24: bya ba dang / de bzhin du theg pa ni
T03D3791:75b-25: gcig ste gnyis pa med do zhes bya ba la
T03D3791:75b-27: 'ga' zhig gi skrag pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir
T03D3791:75b-28: chos bcu pa dang dkon mchog sprin la sogs pa
T03D3791:75b-29: las theg pa gcig tu bstan pa'i don ni drang
T03D3791:75b-30: ba'i don yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis
T03D3791:75b-32: lang kar gshegs pa las kyang blo gros chen po
T03D3791:75b-33: nyan thos kyi theg pas grol ba ma yin gyi
T03D3791:75b-34: / 'on kyang de dag gi theg pa chen po'i
T03D3791:75b-35: mthar thug pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba gsungs
T03D3791:75b-36: / so // de bzhin du 'phags pa n'a ga rdzu na'i zhal snga nas dang /
T03D3791:75b-37: de'i lugs kyi rjes su 'brang ba theg pa gcig
T03D3791:75b-38: gi tshul du smra ba rnams kyis gsungs pa ni
T03D3791:75b-39: / byang chub rnam pa gnyis thob nas //
T03D3791:75b-40: srid pas skrag yid de dag ni //
T03D3791:75b-41: tshe zad la dga' mya ngan las //
T03D3791:75b-43: de la mya ngan 'das yod min //
T03D3791:75b-44: 'on kyang srid gsum khams su ni //
T03D3791:75b-45: skye ba de la yod ma yin //
T03D3791:75b-46: zag med dbyings gnas de dag kyang //
T03D3791:76a-2: phyis ni sangs rgyas kyis bskul nas //
T03D3791:76a-3: byang chub kyi ni tshogs bsags te //
T03D3791:76a-6: de ltar rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong
T03D3791:76a-7: ba'i de kho na nyid 'di bstan pas 'phags pa
T03D3791:76a-8: rab 'byor la gus pa skyes pa rnams kyi rab
T03D3791:76a-9: tu dang ba 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3791:76a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:76a-11: spyod yul yin na yang don 'di lta bu mngon
T03D3791:76a-12: sum bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i tshig gis bshad
T03D3791:76a-13: do zhes ngo mtshar du gyur pas legs so legs
T03D3791:76a-14: so zhes lan gnyis gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3791:76a-15: brjod par 'dod ba gsal ba kho nar ston pas rab tu dgyes te /
T03D3791:76a-16: yang legs so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T03D3791:76a-17: brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni mdzes pa kho na'o zhes bya ba yin no //
T03D3791:76a-18: gang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni tshig gi phrad de
T03D3791:76a-19: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don la 'jug pa'o
T03D3791:76a-20: // glegs bam la la las ni gang gi phyir zhes zer te /
T03D3791:76a-21: gang gi phyir khyed theg pa gcig tu ston pas
T03D3791:76a-22: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rang gi phyogs bstan
T03D3791:76a-23: par byed pas spro bar byed pa yang legs so
T03D3791:76a-24: zhes bya ba'o // 'phags pa thogs med kyi zhal
T03D3791:76a-25: snga nas dang de'i gzhung gi rjes su 'brang ba
T03D3791:76a-26: theg pa sna tshogs su smra ba rnams ni gzhan
T03D3791:76a-27: du 'chad de gang dag yang dag pa nyid du
T03D3791:76a-28: nges pa la zhugs la zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:76a-29: pa'i tshig ni nges pa'i don yin la /
T03D3791:76a-30: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig ni drang ba'i don yin te /
T03D3791:76a-31: de bas na khyab pa'i don ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs can gyi dbang du byas pa yin no //
T03D3791:76a-33: kha cig dag ni drang phyir dang //
T03D3791:76a-34: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni //
T03D3791:76a-35: ma nges rnams la theg gcig bstan //
T03D3791:76a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mdo sde gzhan
T03D3791:76a-37: dang 'gal ba yongs su bsal ba yin no zhes
T03D3791:76a-38: so // sngar gyi theg pa gcig tu ston pa'i
T03D3791:76a-39: phyogs la ni gang dag nyan thos la sogs pa'i
T03D3791:76a-40: byang chub rtogs pa sngon du 'gro bas byang chub
T03D3791:76a-41: chen po rtogs par 'gyur ba de dag ni dus
T03D3791:76a-42: de tsam la brten nas nyan thos la sogs pa'i
T03D3791:76a-43: rigs su bstan pa yin la /
T03D3791:76a-44: dang po kho nar rab tu dga' ba la sogs
T03D3791:76b-0: pa'i sa @76b rtogs pa'i rim gyis bla na med
T03D3791:76b-1: pa'i byang chub la brten pa rnams ni theg pa
T03D3791:76b-2: chen po'i rigs can yin pa'i phyir rigs kyi dbye
T03D3791:76b-5: da ni lam shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang byed pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3791:76b-6: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
T03D3791:76b-7: phan btags zin pa dran pa mkhas pa ni bka' drin gzo ba'o //
T03D3791:76b-8: khyad par gyi lam la sogs bas dgos pa yongs
T03D3791:76b-9: su ma rdzogs pa yin pa'i phyir phan pa mdzad
T03D3791:76b-11: ci'i phyir de ltar smras snyam pa'i dogs pa de
T03D3791:76b-12: ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya bas bsu nas
T03D3791:76b-13: / brjod pa ni bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3791:76b-14: bdag cag rnams kyi don du zhes bya ba ni
T03D3791:76b-15: bdag cag gi dgos pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha
T03D3791:76b-16: tshig ste / nyan thos kyi theg pa sngon du
T03D3791:76b-17: 'gro ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa'i phyir ro
T03D3791:76b-19: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni bdag cag rnams kyi don du zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03D3791:76b-20: yang na ji ltar gdams pa'o //
T03D3791:76b-21: byang chub kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur ro //
T03D3791:76b-22: tshangs par spyad pa ni mi tshangs par spyod pa las ldog pa ste /
T03D3791:76b-23: tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pas //
T03D3791:76b-24: sgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor //
T03D3791:76b-25: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03D3791:76b-26: 'dis ni ci rigs par bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid du ston to //
T03D3791:76b-27: spyod pa na zhes bya ba 'khor ba ji srid
T03D3791:76b-28: par sems can rnams kyi don bya ba la 'jug
T03D3791:76b-29: pa nyid kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni
T03D3791:76b-30: lam shes pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa rnam pa
T03D3791:76b-31: thams cad du spong bar mi byed pa zhes bya
T03D3791:76b-32: ba ni 'di'i rang bzhin yin pas nyon mongs pa
T03D3791:76b-33: rnams dbang du byas nas dus yun ring por sgrub
T03D3791:76b-34: par byed pa na zhes bya ba 'dis ni rang
T03D3791:76b-36: gzhan du na byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su
T03D3791:76b-37: rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'dod do
T03D3791:76b-38: // pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gdams shing zhes bya ba ni /

T03D3791:80b-15: 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te

T03D3791:81a-38: gcig nyid la sogs pa grangs dang bral ba'i phyir grangs med pa'o //

T03D3791:113b-30: pa yang nyung ba yin pa de bzhin du shes

T03D3791:113b-32: la sogs pa byed pa ni nyung ngo zhes de'i
T03D3791:113b-33: tshig gis bstan pa yin no zhes bya bar gzung
T03D3791:113b-34: ste / gzhan du brgya byin gyis zhus pa'i tshig la ci yang ma gsungs par 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:113b-35: ches nyung ba dang ches shin tu nyung ba la
T03D3791:113b-36: sogs pa bstan pas brjod ma thag pa'i don rgyas

T03D3791:113b-39: sems bskyed pa rgyas par byed nas zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:113b-40: blo ldan sems mchog bskyed ma thag tu yang //

T03D3791:113b-42: 'byor pa'i dus dang rgud pa'i dus dag tu //

T03D3791:113b-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yon tan rjes su
T03D3791:113b-45: dran nas sgrub pa rgyas shing bstan par byed pa'o
T03D3791:113b-46: // brtson 'grus brtsams shing zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus 'bar ba'o //
T03D3791:114a-0: rnal 'byor du byed pa zhes bya ba ni bsam @114a * //
T03D3791:114a-1: gtan gyi stobs kyis sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
