T03D3791:114a-3: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba la'o //
T03D3791:114a-4: lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:114a-5: yangs shing rgya che dga' ba dang //
T03D3791:114a-6: dgos pa che la brtson pa dang //
T03D3791:114a-7: dge ba nyid ni lhag pa yis //
T03D3791:114a-8: bsam pa dam pa'i lhag bsam yin //
T03D3791:114a-9: zhes bya ba'i khyad par can gyi bsam pa dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3791:114a-10: de dag la yang zhes bya ba ni nyan pa po de dag go //
T03D3791:114a-11: gzhan yang ches shin tu nyung ba nyid bstan par
T03D3791:114a-12: bya ba'i phyir koo shi ka yang gang dag byang
T03D3791:114a-13: chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang zhes bya ba la
T03D3791:114a-14: sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3791:114a-15: thams cad bsam pa mnyam pa la 'jug pa ma yin nam /
T03D3791:114a-16: ji ltar na gcig gam gnyis shig gnas par 'gyur
T03D3791:114a-17: snyam pa'i dogs pa de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes
T03D3791:114a-19: koo shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par
T03D3791:114a-20: rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:114a-21: pa gsungs te / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi dang /
T03D3791:114a-22: mthong ba dang sgom pa dang khyad par gyi lam
T03D3791:114a-23: rnams la brtson 'grus phul du byung ba dang bral
T03D3791:114a-24: ba'i phyir / brtson 'grus zhan pa zhes bya ba
T03D3791:114a-25: la sogs pa tshig bdun gyi don go rims bzhin
T03D3791:114a-27: 'di skad du brtson 'grus phul du byung ba med
T03D3791:114a-28: pas dang por bsam pa mtshungs pas zhugs pa yin
T03D3791:114a-29: du zin kyang thams cad bla na med pa yang
T03D3791:114a-30: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snod ma yin
T03D3791:114a-31: no zhes brjod pa yin no //
T03D3791:114a-32: bsgrub par dka' ba zhes bya ba ni bgrod par dka' ba'o //
T03D3791:114a-33: chung ngu'i chen po'i rnam pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3791:114a-34: koo sha ka de bas na de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:114a-35: myur du zhes bya ba ni rings par ro //
T03D3791:114a-36: bde bar zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med par ro //
T03D3791:114a-37: rgyun mi 'chad par zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du'o//
T03D3791:114a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid don du gnyer bas byang
T03D3791:114a-39: chub kyi spyod pa la bslab par bya ba ma
T03D3791:114a-40: yin nam / de ni ci ltar shes rab kyi
T03D3791:114a-41: pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya snyam
T03D3791:114a-42: pa'i dogs pa de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya
T03D3791:114a-43: yin nam / bas bsu nas / koo shi ka
T03D3791:114a-44: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so
T03D3791:114b-0: yin nam / bas bsu nas / // ngag gi don ni @114b 'di yin te /
T03D3791:114b-1: gang gi phyir sngon bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
T03D3791:114b-2: dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na spyod pa yongs su
T03D3791:114b-3: rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
T03D3791:114b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
T03D3791:114b-5: pa de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang sangs rgyas
T03D3791:114b-6: kyi yon tan thams cad thob pa'i rgyu ni shes
T03D3791:114b-7: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten par
T03D3791:114b-8: bya'o // gzhan du na dmigs pas ni byang chub
T03D3791:114b-9: sems dpa'i spyod pa rdzogs par mi 'gyur zhing byang
T03D3791:114b-10: chub rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems
T03D3791:114b-11: dpa' des shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3791:114b-12: 'bring gi chung ngu'i rnam pa bstan pa'i phyir koo
T03D3791:114b-13: shi ka de bas na de ltar zhes bya ba
T03D3791:114b-15: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:114b-16: mu sar gal ba bee d'u rya //
T03D3791:114b-17: dngul dang shel dang gser dang ni //
T03D3791:114b-18: mu tig dmar bcas rdo snying rnams //
T03D3791:114b-19: kun las gtso phyir rin po che //
T03D3791:114b-20: sna bdun brjod pa yang na ni //
T03D3791:114b-21: mdog dang dbyibs kyi cha tsam las //
T03D3791:114b-22: de las tha dad rin po che //
T03D3791:114b-23: gzhan pa dag ni yin par brjod //
T03D3791:114b-24: ces bshad pas na rin po che sna bdun po de dag gi rang bzhin no //
T03D3791:114b-25: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo'o //
T03D3791:114b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can
T03D3791:114b-27: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
T03D3791:114b-29: bye ba mang po zhes bya ba ni bye ba ni bye ba du ma yin no //
T03D3791:114b-30: de'i gzhi las zhes bya ba ni rgyu de las so //
T03D3791:114b-31: la la las ni de las gzhi'i bsod nams zhes 'don to //
T03D3791:114b-33: ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten la
T03D3791:114b-34: mchod pa de la ltos nas gzhi des sangs rgyas
T03D3791:114b-35: nyid 'thob pa'i rgyu'i bsod nams mang du bskyed dam
T03D3791:114b-37: bsod nams zhes bya ba ni mngon pa kun las btus pa las /
T03D3791:114b-38: 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i dge ba gang yin pa ni bsod nams zhes bya ba la /
T03D3791:114b-39: gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa
T03D3791:114b-40: ni mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'o zhes ming tha
T03D3791:114b-42: 'dir spyir dge ba la bsod nams zhes bya bar shes par bya ste /
T03D3791:114b-43: gzugs kyi khams na yang don 'di srid pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:114b-44: bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:115a-2: mang po zhes bya yang bstan to //
T03D3791:115a-3: rings bag la sogs khyad par las //
T03D3791:115a-4: bde gshegs zhes kyang shes par bya //
T03D3791:115a-6: mngon par dad de zhes bya ba ni mngon par yid ches par byed pa'o //
T03D3791:115a-7: rtog cing zhes bya ba ni yid la 'jog pa'o //
T03D3791:115a-8: mos la zhes bya ba ni lhag par mos pa'i yid la byed pas dmigs pa'o //
T03D3791:115a-9: sems dang bas zhes bya ba ni bzang po nyid du mthong bas sems mngon par phyogs pa'o //
T03D3791:115a-10: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas zhes bya ba ni
T03D3791:115a-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3791:115a-12: chub kyi rgyur byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa len
T03D3791:115a-13: cing sems khyad par can du byas pa'o //
T03D3791:115a-14: don rnam par 'grel pa dang zhes bya ba ni don kho na 'ba' zhig blangs te ston pa'o //
T03D3791:115a-15: yid kyi rjes su rtog pa dang zhes bya ba
T03D3791:115a-16: ni phan tshun mi 'gal bar nges par rtogs pa'o
T03D3791:115a-17: // ji lta bur grub pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
T03D3791:115a-18: 'bring gi chung du la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i mos
T03D3791:115a-19: pa grub pa gang dang yang dag par ldan pa
T03D3791:115a-20: dang / shes rab gang yin pa de yang ji ltar grub pa yin te /
T03D3791:115a-21: nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir
T03D3791:115a-22: yongs su dpyod par byed cing zhes bya ba yongs
T03D3791:115a-24: dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba ni de'i rgyu mtshan no //
T03D3791:115a-25: de nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T03D3791:115a-26: sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul ni gtso mo ste yum
T03D3791:115a-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin
T03D3791:115a-28: la / 'di ni glegs bam du bris pa med
T03D3791:115a-29: na klag pa dang kha ton la sogs pa med
T03D3791:115a-30: pa 'gyur bas de rgyun chad par ma gyur pa'o
T03D3791:115a-31: la / // de bzhin du yum mi bzhugs te
T03D3791:115a-32: rtogs pa dang lung gi dam pa'i chos nub par
T03D3791:115a-34: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang yum yin pas
T03D3791:115a-35: glegs bam du bzhugs pas nyan pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3791:115a-36: mtshan gyi phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur
T03D3791:115a-37: ba yin no // tshul dang ma bral bas zhes
T03D3791:115a-38: bya ba la gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni
T03D3791:115a-40: bas zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir yin pas te gzhag par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03D3791:115a-41: bzhag pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan yang
T03D3791:115a-42: ji skad du bshad pa'i bsam pas bkur stir bya
T03D3791:115b-0: ba la sogs pa @115b yang bya'o zhes gsungs pa
T03D3791:115b-1: ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de
T03D3791:115b-2: la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3791:115b-3: nyan pa la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad kyis
T03D3791:115b-4: ni chos spyod rnam pa bcu bshad pa yin te
T03D3791:115b-5: / yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin pa dang //
T03D3791:115b-6: nyan dang klog dang len pa dang //
T03D3791:115b-7: 'chad dang kha ton byed pa dang //
T03D3791:115b-8: de sems pa dang sgom pa'o //
T03D3791:115b-9: chos spyod de bcu'i bdag nyid ni //
T03D3791:115b-10: bsod nams phung po dpag tu med //
T03D3791:115b-11: khyad par phyir dang mi zad phyir //
T03D3791:115b-12: gzhan la phan 'dogs ma zhi phyir //
T03D3791:115b-13: zhes bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T03D3791:115b-14: 'bring gi rnam pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03D3791:115b-15: koo shi ka rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod
T03D3791:115b-16: rten gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying
T03D3791:115b-17: po can bye ba du ma lta zhog gi zhes
T03D3791:115b-18: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3791:115b-19: 'dzam bu gling zhes bya ba ni //
T03D3791:115b-20: 'dzam bu gling ste ngos gsum la //
T03D3791:115b-21: stong phrag gnyis so shing rta'i dbyibs //
T03D3791:115b-22: gcig la sogs tshad phyed dang bzhi //

T03D3791:115b-26: sna bdun gyi mchod rten zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:115b-28: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:115b-29: de la snod kyi 'jig rten gyi //
T03D3791:115b-31: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rngams su ni //
T03D3791:115b-32: sa ya drug 'bum grangs med do //
T03D3791:115b-33: chu rngams 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang //
T03D3791:115b-34: stong phrag dag ni nyi shu'o //
T03D3791:115b-35: phyis ni rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad //
T03D3791:115b-36: lhag ma dag ni gser du 'gyur //
T03D3791:115b-37: lhun po rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin //
T03D3791:115b-38: gser gyi ri ni bdun po ste ;
T03D3791:115b-39: / dang po nyid ni gnya' shing 'dzin //
T03D3791:115b-40: gshol mda' 'dzin ; dang seng ldeng can //
T03D3791:115b-41: blta na sdug dang rta rna dang /
T03D3791:115b-43: de nas gling ni rnam pa bzhi //
T03D3791:115b-44: lho la sogs pa'i phyogs la brten //
T03D3791:115b-45: 'dzam bu gling ste ngos gsum la /
T03D3791:115b-46: stong phrag gnyis so shing rta'i dbyibs //
T03D3791:115b-47: gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi //
T03D3791:115b-50: dpag chad sum brgya lnga bcu'o //

T03D3791:115b-52: stong phrag phyed dang brgyad yin no //
T03D3791:115b-53: sgra mi snyan ni gru bzhir mnyam //
T03D3791:116a-2: de yi bar gyi gling brgyad ni //
T03D3791:116a-3: lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan //
T03D3791:116a-4: sgra mi snyan gyi zla dang ni //
T03D3791:116a-5: rnga yab dang ni rnga yab gzhan //
T03D3791:116a-6: g-yo ldan dang ni lam mchog 'gro //
T03D3791:116a-7: de dag grangs ni ji bzhin 'dod //
T03D3791:116a-8: gling bzhi po ni de dag gi /
T03D3791:116a-9: phyi rol na ni khor yug ste //
T03D3791:116a-10: mtshams bcad dang 'drar lcags las ni //
T03D3791:116a-11: byung ba'i ri ni nag por bcas //
T03D3791:116a-12: 'di kun chu'i nang brgyad khri dag / nub po chu yi steng du yang //
T03D3791:116a-13: dpag tshad dag ni brgyad khri'o //
T03D3791:116a-15: de dag rngams su'ang 'phang dang mnyam //
T03D3791:116a-16: de yi bar bdun rol mtsho yin //
T03D3791:116a-17: dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o //
T03D3791:116a-18: de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin //
T03D3791:116a-19: de yi ngos la sum 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:116a-20: rol mtsho gzhan ni phyed phyed do //
T03D3791:116a-21: lhag ma phyi yi mtsho chen yin //
T03D3791:116a-22: ri rab kyi steng yan chad yin //
T03D3791:116a-23: lha yi gzhal med khang yin no //
T03D3791:116a-25: gling bzhi pa nyid ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bshad do //
T03D3791:116a-26: chen po'i chung ngu ni koo shi ka gling bzhi

T03D3791:116a-28: lta zhog gi ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs

T03D3791:116a-31: / ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang //
T03D3791:116a-32: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni //
T03D3791:116a-33: stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod //
T03D3791:116a-35: koo shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi
T03D3791:116a-36: khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin
T03D3791:116a-37: te / stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:116a-38: de stong la ni stong gnyis pa //
T03D3791:116a-39: bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no //
T03D3791:116a-40: chen po'i chen po bstan pa'i phyir //
T03D3791:116a-41: koo shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten
T03D3791:116a-42: gyi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
T03D3791:116a-43: yin te / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:116a-44: de stong la ni stong gsum gyi //
T03D3791:116a-45: 'jig rten khams ni bla na med //
T03D3791:116a-46: khor yug chen pos yongs su bskor //
T03D3791:116a-48: bdag tu nga rgyal gyi sa bon ma zad pa
T03D3791:116a-49: nyid kyis dang po kho nar rang gi don gyi
T03D3791:116a-50: mos pa rnam pa dgur bstan nas /
T03D3791:116b-0: rang dang @116b gzhan gyi don gyi mos pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3791:116b-1: koo shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
T03D3791:116b-2: rten gyi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T03D3791:116b-3: te / snga phyi med par zhes bya ba ni
T03D3791:116b-4: snga ma med par phyi ma yang med par dus
T03D3791:116b-5: gcig tu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3791:116b-6: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi bsod nams bya ba
T03D3791:116b-7: des zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rin
T03D3791:116b-8: po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten ring bsrel gyi
T03D3791:116b-9: snying po can byas nas bkur stir byed pa la
T03D3791:116b-10: sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi bsod nams kyi sems

T03D3791:116b-12: 'dran pa rnams ni chos nyid lta //
T03D3791:116b-13: zhes gsungs pas chos nyid kyi rang bzhin shes rab

T03D3791:116b-17: zhig gi don bya ba'i phyir rang gi rtogs pa

T03D3791:116b-21: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la zhes bya
T03D3791:116b-22: ba la sogs pa gsol to //

T03D3791:116b-25: ba'i phyir / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'di lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol te /
T03D3791:116b-26: rnam grangs zhes bya ba ni rgyas par bstan pas so //
T03D3791:116b-27: sil snyan thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni pi
T03D3791:116b-28: bang dang gling bu la sogs pa sil snyan stong
T03D3791:116b-30: glu blangs thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni legs

T03D3791:123a-13: de lta bu'i sbyin pa ni 'bras bu longs spyod
T03D3791:123a-14: pas zad par 'gyur ba'i phyir phul du phyin par
T03D3791:123a-15: 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes so //
T03D3791:123a-16: ston dngos rjes 'jug blo can gyis //
T03D3791:123a-17: dris pa nyid las bzung ba'i don de ma lags so zhes brjod pas bstan pa yin no //
T03D3791:123a-18: tshul khrims la sogs pa yang bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir //
T03D3791:123a-19: de bzhin du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3791:123a-20: de ltar ldon pa'i sgo nas shes rab kyis yongs
T03D3791:123a-21: su zin pa'i stobs las sbyin pa la sogs pa
T03D3791:123a-22: rnams pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yin par
T03D3791:123a-23: bstan nas / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3791:123a-24: pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir kun dga' bo 'di
T03D3791:123a-25: ji snyam du sems dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

T03D3791:123a-29: bstan nas / gsungs so // do // bcom ldan

T03D3791:123a-31: bstan nas / gsungs so // do // pa gsol

T03D3791:123a-34: bstan nas / gsungs so // do // pa gsol

T03D3791:123a-36: sogs pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir mchog
T03D3791:123a-37: tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T03D3791:123a-38: yum pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i don nye
T03D3791:123a-39: bar bsdu ba'i phyir kun dga' bo de lta bas
T03D3791:123a-40: na dam pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la
T03D3791:123a-42: sngon du 'gro ba'i mjug sdud par byed pas kun
T03D3791:123a-43: dga' bo de lta bas na dge ba'i rtsa ba
T03D3791:123a-44: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i
T03D3791:123a-45: phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3791:123a-46: 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs
T03D3791:123a-47: pa 'tshang rgya ba nyid du 'dren pa yin pa'i
T03D3791:123a-48: phyir ro // yongs su 'dren pa zhes bya ba
T03D3791:123b-0: ni nye bar 'tshe ba @123b thams cad bzlog pa
T03D3791:123b-2: tshul 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad
T03D3791:123b-3: du gsungs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa la sogs pa
T03D3791:123b-4: lnga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T03D3791:123b-5: nang du 'dus pas de sgrogs na pha rol tu
T03D3791:123b-6: phyin pa drug po thams cad sgrogs par 'gyur bas
T03D3791:123b-7: rgyal ba'i yum gcig pu kho na bstan pa ni
T03D3791:123b-8: ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3791:123b-9: gang yang nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3791:123b-10: phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing smra ste zhes bya
T03D3791:123b-11: ba la sogs pa sngar gsungs pa de ni gtsor
T03D3791:123b-12: bya ba yin pas nyes pa med do //
T03D3791:123b-13: 'di nyid dpes bstan par bya ba'i phyir kun dga'
T03D3791:123b-14: bo 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po la
T03D3791:123b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:123b-16: skye bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3791:123b-17: dpes bstan pa'i don ni kun dga' bo de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3791:123b-18: 'bring gi chung du'i dbang du byas nas bcom ldan
T03D3791:123b-19: 'das re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsol
T03D3791:123b-20: to ; / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3791:123b-21: pa'i yon tan 'di dag thams cad ces bya ba
T03D3791:123b-22: to ; ni / 'di dag ni yum mtha' dag pa'i yon tan thams cad ni ma yin te /
T03D3791:123b-23: de'i yon tan ni shin tu mang ba'i phyir ro zhes 'dod pa'o //
T03D3791:123b-24: de lta na yon tan 'di su zhig gi yin zhe na /
T03D3791:123b-25: 'on kyang gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:123b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas 'di'i phyogs gcig blangs pa gang yin pa ste /
T03D3791:123b-27: de yang 'das ma thag pa'i mu stegs can gzhan
T03D3791:123b-28: la sogs pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir rab tu
T03D3791:123b-29: ston pa de'i yon tan yin no zhes bya ba'i
T03D3791:123b-30: tha tshig go // yang dag par smras pas lags
T03D3791:123b-31: so zhes bya ba byin pa ni koo shi ka
T03D3791:123b-32: legs so legs so zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3791:123b-33: de lta mod kyi de tsam gyi phyogs gcig gi
T03D3791:123b-34: bdag nyid can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3791:123b-35: phyin pa de tsam yang gang zhig 'dzin pa nas
T03D3791:123b-36: de bzhin du kha ton byed pa'i bar nyi tshe
T03D3791:123b-37: la yon tan 'di dag 'byung ba 'ba' zhig tu
T03D3791:123b-39: 'on kyang gang gis bris nas mchod pa sngon du
T03D3791:123b-40: 'gro bas glegs bam tsam du chud par byas te
T03D3791:123b-41: bzhag pa de la yang yon tan mtha' yas pa
T03D3791:123b-42: 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes ston par mdzad pa ni
T03D3791:123b-43: koo shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3791:123b-44: phyin pa 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T03D3791:124a-2: / phan yon thos bas mang du gces par byed
T03D3791:124a-3: pa skyed pa nyid kyis na bcom ldan 'das bdag
T03D3791:124a-4: gis kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol te
T03D3791:124a-5: / smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni dris
T03D3791:124a-6: nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'dzin pa la sogs
T03D3791:124a-7: pa byed pa la bdag gis srung ba la sogs
T03D3791:124a-8: pa bgyid pa la ni som nyi ci zhig mchis
T03D3791:124a-9: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3791:124a-10: de bzhin du koo shi ka legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
T03D3791:124a-11: 'bring gi 'bring bstan par bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi
T03D3791:124a-12: bu'am rigs kyi bu mo zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:124a-13: pa gsungs te / spobs pa nye bar sgrub po
T03D3791:124a-14: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa dang grol ba smra
T03D3791:124a-16: 'dun pa zhes bya ba ni smra bar dga' ba'o //
T03D3791:124a-17: phan yon gyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang bstan par
T03D3791:124a-18: bya ba'i phyir gzhan yang koo shi ka zhes bya
T03D3791:124a-19: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:124a-20: klan ka tshol ba la zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:124a-21: pa la 'ga' zhig rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pas
T03D3791:124a-22: rgol zhing rtsod par byed na mi rung ngo snyam
T03D3791:124a-23: du sems zhum par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:124a-24: sems zhum pa ni sems rmongs shing 'khums pa nyid do //
T03D3791:124a-25: shes rab la sogs pa phul du byung ba srid
T03D3791:124a-26: pa na skyes bus sems kyi yon tan mi shes
T03D3791:124a-27: pas ji ste de ltar mi 'gyur snyam du dgongs
T03D3791:124a-28: pa de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya bas bsu
T03D3791:124a-29: nas / 'di ltar de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:124a-30: 'di skad du 'khor gyi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3791:124a-31: 'jigs pa ni dngos por 'dzin pa las byung ba
T03D3791:124a-32: yin zhing de la ni shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3791:124a-33: tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis las
T03D3791:124a-34: dbye ba po dang bya ba la sogs pa'i nye
T03D3791:124a-35: bar dmigs pa med pas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro
T03D3791:124a-37: 'bring gi chen po bstan pa'i phyir koo shi ka
T03D3791:124a-38: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T03D3791:124a-39: / de la mdza' bo ni phan pa dang bde ba byed pa'o //
T03D3791:124a-40: blon po ni gros mkhan gyi gtso bo'o //
T03D3791:124a-41: gnyen bshes ni pha dang ma las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i skye bo'o /
T03D3791:124a-42: snag gi gnyen mtshams ni ma dang pha gcig las skyes pa'i sbun zla la sogs pa'o //
T03D3791:124a-43: dge sbyong ni sh'akya'i sras rnams so //
T03D3791:124b-0: chen po'i chung du bstan pa'i phyir de la @124b
T03D3791:124b-1: pha rol rgol ba byung zhing zhes bya ba la
T03D3791:124b-3: chos dang ldan pas char gcod pa zhes bya ba la /
T03D3791:124b-4: kha cig ni de rnams tshig gis zil gyis gnon pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T03D3791:124b-5: gzhan dag ni de smras pa'i bsgrub ba'i chos sun
T03D3791:124b-6: phyung bas bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang lhan cig
T03D3791:124b-7: tu de rnams sel ba yin no zhes 'dod do
T03D3791:124b-8: // stobs yod pa ni thos pa dang po la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:124b-9: nus pa yod pa ni shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa so //
T03D3791:124b-10: brgal ba na zhes bya ba ni rgol ba la'o //
T03D3791:124b-11: de la lung ston pa ni legs par lan thebs pa'o //
T03D3791:124b-12: der nus pa ni rung ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3791:124b-13: chen po'i 'bring bstan pa'i phyir koo shi ka yang
T03D3791:124b-14: sa phyogs gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3791:124b-16: de la thag ring po nas lta bas na lta bar 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3791:124b-17: thal mo sbyor bar byed pas na phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3791:124b-18: gang du lhags nas dkyil 'khor lnga pas rab tu 'dud par byed pas 'dud par 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3791:124b-19: so sor nges pa smos pas brgya la 'di tsam
T03D3791:124b-20: phyed pa kho na yin no snyam du blo skye
T03D3791:124b-21: bar 'gyur ba dag srid pas koo shi ka khyod
T03D3791:124b-22: 'di snyam du tshangs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:124b-23: pa gsungs so // snga ma bzhin du sbyar te
T03D3791:124b-24: zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa yang dag
T03D3791:124b-25: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs
T03D3791:124b-26: pa de dag der 'ongs par sems te zhes bya
T03D3791:124b-27: ba la sogs pa'i tshig bsgre bar bya'o zhes bya
T03D3791:124b-29: de la tshangs rigs la sogs pa gsum ni bsam gtan dang pos bsdus pa yin no ;
T03D3791:124b-30: /'od chung la sogs pa gsum yang bsam gtan gnyis pa las skyes pa yin no //
T03D3791:124b-31: dge chung la sogs pa gsum ni bsam gtan gsum pa la gnas pa yin no //
T03D3791:124b-32: sprin med pa la sogs pa brgyad ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin no //
T03D3791:124b-33: 'du shes med pa'i sems can ni 'bras bu che ba'i phyogs gcig na yod do //
T03D3791:124b-34: bsod nams lhag ba skye bar bya ba'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa la bslab pa ni /
T03D3791:124b-35: koo shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
T03D3791:124b-36: des 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:125a-0: pa gsungs te / 'di las zhes bya ba ni glegs bam 'di las zhes bya @125a * //
T03D3791:125a-2: de bzhin du blo dman pa 'ga' zhig rtog pa
T03D3791:125a-3: skye bar dogs nas koo shi ka khyod 'di snyam
T03D3791:125a-4: du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:125a-5: de nyid kyi 'dres kyi zhabs su brjod pas ni
T03D3791:125a-6: koo shi ka de ltar mi blta'o zhes gsungs so
T03D3791:125a-7: // de la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i bag ni
T03D3791:125a-8: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal ma spangs
T03D3791:125a-9: pa 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa rnams so //
T03D3791:125a-10: gzugs na spyod pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ni spangs /
T03D3791:125a-11: gzugs kyi 'dod chags kyi mngon par zhen pa gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa rnams so //
T03D3791:125a-12: chen po'i chen po bstan pa'i phyir yang koo shi
T03D3791:125a-13: ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i khyim
T03D3791:125a-14: dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3791:125a-15: de la khyim ni skye bo tha mal ba'i gnas so //
T03D3791:125a-16: gnas khang ni dge slong rnams gnas pa'i khang pa'o //
T03D3791:125a-17: khang bzangs ni so phag la sogs pa las byas pa'i gnas khyad par can phyug po'i khyim mo //
T03D3791:125a-18: shin tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba ni mi la sogs pa'i 'tshe ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:125a-19: ci'i phyir khyim la sogs pa shin tu bsrung bar 'gyur zhes rtog pa la /
T03D3791:125a-20: koo shi ka de ltar gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3791:125a-21: de ltar gzi brjid che ba zhes bya ba ni mthu che ba'o //
T03D3791:125a-22: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rab tu grags pa'o //
T03D3791:125a-23: 'di skad du gang gi phyir de ltar rab tu
T03D3791:125a-24: grags pa'i gzi brjid che ba khyim gang du 'ong
T03D3791:125a-25: bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de'i phyir khyim la
T03D3791:125a-26: sogs pa de rnams la mthus legs par bsrung bar
T03D3791:125a-27: 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa yin no ;
T03D3791:125a-28: / sems can gyi khams yid ches par dka' ba
T03D3791:125a-29: rnams shin tu yid ches pa bskyed par bya ba'i
T03D3791:125a-30: phyir zhus pa ni bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am
T03D3791:125a-31: rigs kyi bu mo des zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:125a-33: skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan ma 'byung
T03D3791:125a-34: ba gsungs pa ni koo shi ka gal te zhes
T03D3791:125a-36: der snang ba chen po dag mthong nas zhes bya
T03D3791:125a-37: ba ni khyim der 'od kyi snang ba chen po
T03D3791:125a-38: 'byung bar mthong na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3791:125a-39: nges par zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar ro //
T03D3791:125a-40: mi ma yin pa'i 'dri sngon chad ma bsnams pa bro bar gyur na zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:125b-0: mi ma yin @125b pa'i dri mi'i 'jig rten las
T03D3791:125b-1: 'das pa khyad par can gyi dri sna'i rnam par
T03D3791:125b-2: shes pas nyams su myong ba'o //
T03D3791:125b-3: sngon chad ma bsnams pa zhes bya ba ni sngon ma myangs pa'o //
T03D3791:125b-4: 'ongs zhes bya ba ni nye bar phyin pa'o //
T03D3791:125b-5: lhags pa'i zhes bya ba ni khang pa la sogs pa'i nang du zhugs pas so //
T03D3791:125b-6: kun tu spyod pa gzob par byed par 'gyur zhes
T03D3791:125b-7: bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas
T03D3791:125b-9: kun tu spyod pa gtsang sbra byed par 'gyur zhes
T03D3791:125b-10: bya ba ni gos la sogs pa gtsang ma la
T03D3791:125b-11: nye bar longs spyod pas phyi yongs su dag pa'o
T03D3791:125b-12: // yi rangs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3791:125b-13: ni yid bde ba chung du dang 'bring dang chen
T03D3791:125b-14: po dang ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03D3791:125b-15: mgu ba nyid ni yid bde ba yin la de
T03D3791:125b-16: skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la de
T03D3791:125b-17: skad ces bya'o // gnas pa zhes bya ba ni sngar gnas pa'o //
T03D3791:125b-18: 'byol bar zhes bya ba ni 'gro bar bya'o snyam pa'o //
T03D3791:125b-19: ji ltar na sngar gnas pa 'bad pa med par
T03D3791:125b-20: 'jol bar 'gyur snyam pa'i dogs pa de ci'i phyir
T03D3791:125b-21: zhe na zhes bya bas bsu nas /
T03D3791:125b-22: lha dang klu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3791:125b-23: dpal dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsum
T03D3791:125b-24: ni mthu chung du dang 'bring dang chen po nyid
T03D3791:125b-25: bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3791:125b-26: 'di skad du gzi brjid chen po de dag gi
T03D3791:125b-27: mthu nyid kyis 'gro ba yin pas 'bad pa la
T03D3791:125b-28: ltos mi dgos so zhes brjod pa yin no //
T03D3791:125b-29: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du'o //
T03D3791:125b-30: dad pa mang bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni
T03D3791:125b-31: mngon par yid ches su rung ba mthong bas dad
T03D3791:125b-33: sngar spyir thams cad du kun tu spyod pa gzob
T03D3791:125b-34: par byed pa dang gtsang sbra byed par 'gyur ba'i
T03D3791:125b-35: kun tu spyod pa dang bstan nas khyad par du
T03D3791:125b-36: lhur bya ba'i don gsungs pa ni yang koo shi
T03D3791:125b-37: ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo zhes bya
T03D3791:125b-39: de'i khor yug tu zhes bya ba ni kun nas
T03D3791:125b-40: yongs su la 'khor bar zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T03D3791:125b-41: go // lus ngal bar mi 'gyur ba dang zhes
T03D3791:125b-42: bya ba ni yul gzhan du 'gro ba la sogs
T03D3791:125b-43: pas lus dub par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3791:125b-44: sems ngal bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsod
T03D3791:125b-45: snyoms la sogs pa sogs ma rnyed pas sems skyo
T03D3791:126a-2: de bde [?] bar nyal bar byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:126a-3: lus tshab la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:126a-4: bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:126a-5: 'chag pa la sogs pa'i dus su tsher ma la sogs pas ma gces pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:126a-6: bgro ba byed pa zhes bya ba ni phan tshun gzhung dang don gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:126a-7: 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba
T03D3791:126a-8: ni chos thams cad dmigs su med pas 'tshang rgya
T03D3791:126a-9: ba nyid do // 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T03D3791:126a-10: zhes bya ba ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig
T03D3791:126a-11: rten gyi khams rnam pa gnyis po go rims bzhin
T03D3791:126a-12: du bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa dang
T03D3791:126a-13: ba nyid do // / rdo dang tsher ma la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
T03D3791:126a-14: lus kyi nang du mdangs bcug pas shin tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3791:126a-15: lus la stobs gang yin pa dang /
T03D3791:126a-16: tshig la gzi brjid gang yin pa dang /
T03D3791:126a-17: blo la shin tu rno ba gang yin pa de
T03D3791:126a-18: lta bu'i mdangs gsum gang du rab tu bcug pa
T03D3791:126a-19: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T03D3791:126a-20: gang yang lus zhes smos pa des gtso bor lus

T03D3791:240a-32: pa'i blo can rnams kyis gnyis su med pa sgyu
T03D3791:240a-33: ma lta bu'i sems yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi
T03D3791:240a-34: rang bzhin thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba'i
T03D3791:240a-35: shes pas rnam par gzhag nas /
T03D3791:240a-36: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyi rnam
T03D3791:240a-37: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa mngon
T03D3791:240a-38: par rtog pa brgyad kyi rim par gus pa dang
T03D3791:240a-39: rgyun mi 'chad pa dang dus yun ring po'i khyad
T03D3791:240a-40: par can gyi bsgom pas sgom par byed pa'i rnal
T03D3791:240a-41: 'byor pa'i dbang phyug rnams ni rten cing 'brel bar
T03D3791:240a-42: 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa mtha'
T03D3791:240a-43: dag dang bral zhing srid pa ji srid par rjes
T03D3791:240a-44: su 'brel pa / rnam par shes pa tsam gyi rgyun sgyu ma lta bu thob bar byed do //
T03D3791:240a-45: de nyid ni gnyen po'i gtso bo yin no //
T03D3791:240a-46: dang po sgyu ma lta bu zhes rnam par 'jog
T03D3791:240a-47: par byed pa mngon par brjod pa dang bcas pa
T03D3791:240a-48: ni de'i rjes su mthun pa yin gyi gnyen po
T03D3791:240a-49: nyid du gyur ba ni ma yin no//
T03D3791:240b-0: @240b 'di ltar phyi'i don gyi tshul la gang zag
T03D3791:240b-1: la bdag med pa la sogs pa bsgoms pas kyang
T03D3791:240b-2: dngos po'i rang bzhin sems la 'jog par byed pa
T03D3791:240b-4: dngos po ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3791:240b-5: de yang dang po med pa'i phyir te yod na bsgom ba don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:240b-6: de'i phyir der yang pha rol po 'di ming tsam
T03D3791:240b-7: dang rjes su 'brel ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs
T03D3791:240b-8: brnyan de kho na nyid la sems gtod pa dang
T03D3791:240b-9: rjes su mthun pa la brten pa /
T03D3791:240b-10: dngos por lhag par zhen pa can gyis mgu ba
T03D3791:240b-11: yin na der ming gi rnam pa goms pa las
T03D3791:240b-12: brjod pa 'phel bar ci ltar mi 'gyur /
T03D3791:240b-13: nang gi bdag nyid g-yo ba med pa ni rim gyis rnam par rtog pa sdud do zhe na /
T03D3791:240b-14: de ltar na gzhan la yang 'di mtshungs te shin tu spros pas chog go //
T03D3791:240b-15: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad du yid du
T03D3791:240b-16: 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid de bstan pa'i phyir chos
T03D3791:240b-17: nyid kyi stobs kyis mtshan ma byung bar gyur to
T03D3791:240b-19: yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di bstan pa de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3791:240b-20: rnam par 'gyur ba drug dang ltas chen po bco
T03D3791:240b-21: brgyad du zhes bya ba ni bye ba'i khyad par
T03D3791:240b-23: de la rnam par 'gyur ba drug ni snod kyi
T03D3791:240b-24: 'jig rten la sa chen po mngon par 'dus byas
T03D3791:240b-25: pa dang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i dbang du
T03D3791:240b-26: byas nas go rims bzhin du g-yo ba dang mtho
T03D3791:240b-27: ba yin no // sems can gyi 'jig rten la ni sems can gyi ris rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3791:240b-28: mi dge ba la spyod pa dang /
T03D3791:240b-29: lha sna tshogs ba la mos pa dang ;
T03D3791:240b-30: nga rgyal can dang rig pa dang ldan pa'i dbang
T03D3791:240b-31: du byas nas go rims bzhin du smra ba dang
T03D3791:240b-32: steng du 'gro ba dang 'og tu 'gro ba dang
T03D3791:240b-33: sgra dpangs mtho bar sgrogs pa'o //
T03D3791:240b-34: ltas chen po bco brgyad kyang rnam par 'gyur ba
T03D3791:240b-35: drug po 'di rnams kyi bya ba chung du dang
T03D3791:240b-36: 'bring dang chen po'i dbye bas te /
T03D3791:240b-37: 'gul ba nas kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur zhes
T03D3791:240b-38: bya pa'i bar gyi don gyis bstan pa yin no
T03D3791:240b-39: // yang na dbus mthon mtha' dma' zhes bya ba ni gcig go //
T03D3791:240b-40: 'di las bzlog pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T03D3791:240b-41: de bzhin du shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma' zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o //
T03D3791:240b-42: 'di nyid bzlog pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T03D3791:241a-1: du lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma' zhes bya ba ni lnga pa'o //
T03D3791:241a-2: 'di nyid bzlog pa ni drug pa ste de ltar na rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:241a-3: ltas chen po bco brgyad kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T03D3791:241a-4: nye bar bsdu ba ni de ltar gnas brtan rab
T03D3791:241a-5: 'byor ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
T03D3791:241a-6: yin te / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes
T03D3791:241a-7: so zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnam pa thams
T03D3791:241a-8: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i rjes su skyes
T03D3791:241a-9: pa nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa yin no //
T03D3791:241a-10: ma skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid ston ba ni gzhan
T03D3791:241a-11: yang gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su
T03D3791:241a-12: ma skyes te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T03D3791:241a-13: pa yin no // de kho na bzhin du ci'i
T03D3791:241a-14: phyir zhe na zhes bya bas dogs pa bsu nas
T03D3791:241a-15: pa yin no // / 'di ltar gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te go sla'o //
T03D3791:241a-16: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni de ltar sgyu
T03D3791:241a-17: ma lta bu nyid kyis lam shes pa nyid kyi
T03D3791:241a-18: rnam pa'i rjes su skyes pas na de bzhin gshegs
T03D3791:241a-19: pa'i rjes su skyes te zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:241a-20: pa'o // de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo
T03D3791:241a-21: nyid ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
T03D3791:241a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol ba yin no
T03D3791:241a-23: pa'o // // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3791:241a-24: kyi rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pas
T03D3791:241a-25: de bzhin nyid 'di ni spyod pa zab mo lags
T03D3791:241a-26: pa'o // // so // legs par smras pa nyid
T03D3791:241a-27: kyi rjes su brjod pa gsungs ba ni sh'a ri'i
T03D3791:241a-28: bu de de bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:241a-30: kyis chos bstan pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin
T03D3791:241a-31: pa ni de bzhin nyid bstan pa 'di bshad pa
T03D3791:241a-32: na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa
T03D3791:241a-34: sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dag gis zhes
T03D3791:241a-36: bya ba la / kha cig na re tshogs kyis
T03D3791:241a-37: la sogs par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
T03D3791:241a-38: yang dag par bsags pa sngon yongs su sbyang ba
T03D3791:241a-39: byas shing bsgrubs pa de rnams kyis sgyu ma lta
T03D3791:241a-40: bu'i chos bsgom pa la bzod pa ste /
T03D3791:241a-41: lhag par mos pa thob par gyur pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T03D3791:241a-42: gzhan dag na re chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro
T03D3791:241a-43: ba gtogs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
T03D3791:241a-44: thob pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T03D3791:241a-45: rgyu gang gis theg pa chen po la zhugs pa
T03D3791:241a-46: rnams la theg pa dman pa'i skabs su zhes gsol
T03D3791:241a-47: pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di
T03D3791:241a-48: rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3791:241b-0: de la rgyu ni nye bar len pa'i @241b rgyu'o ;
T03D3791:241b-1: / rkyen ni lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen no //
T03D3791:241b-2: shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba
T03D3791:241b-3: rgyu yin no zhes gsungs pa ni sh'a ri'i bu
T03D3791:241b-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis zhes bya ba
T03D3791:241b-5: la sogs pa'o // nye bar bsags ba'i don du
T03D3791:241b-6: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3791:241b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no
T03D3791:241b-8: la sogs pa'o // // gsal bar bya ba'i phyir
T03D3791:241b-9: dpe bstan pa ni sh'a ri'i bu 'di lta ste
T03D3791:241b-10: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so
T03D3791:241b-11: la sogs pa'o // // // 'dab chags bya zhig
T03D3791:241b-12: ces bya ba ni 'di la gshog pa gnyis yod
T03D3791:241b-14: mi la yang mdza' bo la sogs pa'i phyogs yod
T03D3791:241b-15: pas 'dab chags su gyur pa srid pas bya zhes
T03D3791:241b-17: shis pa la sogs pa la bya'i sgra yod bas 'dab chags zhes smos pa yin no //
T03D3791:241b-18: de ni ma lags so zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:241b-19: ba'i tshig rigs ba dang mi ldan pa nyid yin
T03D3791:241b-20: no snyam pa'i dogs ba de ci'i slad du zhe
T03D3791:241b-21: na zhes bya bas bsu nas /
T03D3791:241b-22: rdzas lci ba steng gi phyogs mthon bo nas lhung
T03D3791:241b-23: na dngos po'i chos nyid kyis nges bar bya ba'i
T03D3791:241b-24: phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
T03D3791:241b-25: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar lags te gang
T03D3791:241b-26: gis de'i lus kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o
T03D3791:241b-27: // dpe can gyi don gsungs pa ni sh'a ri'i
T03D3791:241b-28: bu de de bzhin te zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3791:241b-29: // pa'o // ltung ngo zhes bya ba ni sbyin
T03D3791:241b-30: pa la sogs pa dang rab tu ldan pa yin
T03D3791:241b-31: na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3791:241b-32: dang thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor ba dang bral bas
T03D3791:241b-33: nyan thos kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba ste /
T03D3791:241b-34: 'dis ni de gnyis ka ni mya ngan las 'das pa la gtso bor bstan pa yin no //
T03D3791:241b-35: de ltar na ji skad du bstan pa'i rnam pa
T03D3791:241b-36: bcu drug kho na ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid
T03D3791:241b-39: nyon mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang //
T03D3791:241b-40: mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dag / dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang //
T03D3791:241b-41: ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang //
T03D3791:241b-42: mngon bar zhen pa bkag pa dang //
T03D3791:241b-43: dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang //
T03D3791:241b-44: mi mthun thogs pa med dang de //
T03D3791:241b-45: gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang //
T03D3791:241b-46: de bzhin nyid ni mi dmigs dang //
T03D3791:241b-47: ngo bo nyid bcu drug bdag nyid //
T03D3791:241b-48: mtshon cha lta bur mtshon pas na //
T03D3791:241b-49: mtshan nyid bzhi par bzhed pa yin //
T03D3791:242a-1: cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan
T03D3791:242a-2: pa kho na la ji skad du bshad pa'i sbyor
T03D3791:242a-3: ba yongs su shes pa 'byung bas thar pa'i cha
T03D3791:242a-4: dang mthun pa bstan pa ni /
T03D3791:242a-5: gzhan yang sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'das
T03D3791:242a-6: pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
T03D3791:242a-7: yin no // de mtshan ma'i tshul gyis zhes bya
T03D3791:242a-8: ba ni mtha' gcig tu mngon par zhen pa'i sbyor
T03D3791:242a-9: yin no // bas so // sems shing zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pas so //
T03D3791:242a-10: kun tu 'dzin pas zhes bya ba ni nges par gyur pas so //
T03D3791:242a-11: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa
T03D3791:242a-12: dag gis ma rtogs pas mi shes mi mthong zhes
T03D3791:242a-14: yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni
T03D3791:242a-15: stong pa nyid kho na bla na med pa yang
T03D3791:242a-16: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin no snyam pas
T03D3791:242a-17: yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:242a-18: snga ma bzhin du de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya bas dogs pa bsu nas /
T03D3791:242a-19: sh'a ri'i bu gang zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs so //
T03D3791:242a-20: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa bstan pa'i skabs yin pas ldog pa bstan pas na 'di skad du /
T03D3791:242a-21: mtshan ma med par dmigs pa'i shes pa'i rnam pas
T03D3791:242a-22: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
T03D3791:242a-23: rang gi rgyud la skye bas yang dag par bsgrub
T03D3791:242a-24: par bya ba la mkhas pa'i shes rab kyi pha
T03D3791:242a-26: thabs kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam
T03D3791:242a-27: pa kun mngon par rtogs pa 'di la thar pa'i
T03D3791:242a-28: cha dang mthun pa yin par 'dod do //
T03D3791:242a-29: 'dir thar pa ni bral ba'i khyad par yin la
T03D3791:242a-30: de'i chal phan pa nyid yin pas na thar pa'i
T03D3791:242a-32: bstan pa la 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur pa thos pa dang bsam pa'i rang bzhin no //
T03D3791:242a-33: de bas na shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa
T03D3791:242a-34: dang bral bas gnyis su lhung ba yin no zhes
T03D3791:242a-37: mtshan med rab tu sbyin la sogs //
T03D3791:242a-38: yang dag sgrub la mkhas pa ni //
T03D3791:242a-39: rnam pa thams cad rtogs 'di la //
T03D3791:242a-40: thar pa'i cha dang mthun par 'dod //
T03D3791:242a-42: mkhas pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni bcom ldan
T03D3791:242a-43: 'das kyis ji ltar bshad pa'i don zhes bya ba
T03D3791:242a-44: la sogs pa gsol pa yin no //
T03D3791:242a-45: bshad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyan thos kyis
T03D3791:242a-46: 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur
T03D3791:242b-0: bar @242b rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don
T03D3791:242b-1: ji ltar bdag gis 'tshal ba de ltar yin na
T03D3791:242b-2: / bsod nams kyi tshogs shin tu mang po dang
T03D3791:242b-3: ldan pa la sogs pa yang byang chub chen po
T03D3791:242b-4: rtogs shing thob pa la the tshom du 'gyur ro
T03D3791:242b-5: / // 'o na ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3791:242b-6: bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol to //
T03D3791:242b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyi /
T03D3791:242b-8: thabs la mkhas pa la yang brtson par bgyi zhes
T03D3791:242b-9: bya ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3791:242b-10: phyin pa ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad
T03D3791:242b-12: thabs la mkhas pa ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i
T03D3791:242b-13: yul la dad pa dang sbyin pa la sogs pa
T03D3791:242b-14: dang / dge ba 'dod pa nyid la sogs pa dran pa dang /
T03D3791:242b-15: las dang byed pa po bya ba mi dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T03D3791:242b-16: des na de ltar dbang po'i don med pas na
T03D3791:242b-17: dbang po ma yin pa'i ngo bo dad pa dang
T03D3791:242b-18: brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang
T03D3791:242b-19: shes rab kyi rang bzhin thar pa'i cha dang mthun
T03D3791:242b-20: pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa lnga nye bar
T03D3791:242b-21: bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur
T03D3791:242b-23: sangs rgyas sogs dmigs dad pa dang //
T03D3791:242b-24: sbyin sogs spyod yul brtson 'grus dang //
T03D3791:242b-25: bsam pa phun tshogs dran pa dang //
T03D3791:242b-26: rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin dang //
T03D3791:242b-27: chos rnams rnam pa thams cad du //
T03D3791:242b-28: shes pa'i shes rab rnam pa lnga //
T03D3791:242b-30: legs par smras pa nyid kyis ni rjes su brjod
T03D3791:242b-31: pa gsungs pa ni sh'a ri'i bu de de bzhin
T03D3791:242b-32: no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3791:242b-33: de lta yin na yang dad pa la sogs pa
T03D3791:242b-34: thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob
T03D3791:242b-35: par mi 'gyur ba ni bcom ldan 'das shes rab
T03D3791:242b-36: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab po
T03D3791:242b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol ba yin no
T03D3791:242b-38: // dad pa la sogs 'bring gis thob par mi nus pa nyid kyis na 'byung bar dka' ba'o //
T03D3791:242b-39: de dag nyid chung ngus rtogs par mi nus pas na shin tu 'byung bar dka' ba'o //
T03D3791:242b-40: de bzhin du rjes su brjod pa gsungs pa ni
T03D3791:242b-41: lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no zhes bya ba
T03D3791:242b-42: la sogs pa'o // shes rab 'chal ba dang zhes
T03D3791:242b-43: bya ba la sogs pa la chos rnam pa thams
T03D3791:242b-44: cad yongs su shes pa dang bral bas na shes
T03D3791:242b-45: la sogs pa'o // rab 'chal pa'o // sbyin pa
T03D3791:242b-46: la sogs pa'i yul la brtson pa med pas na
T03D3791:243a-1: mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang bral bas na mos pa dman pa'o //
T03D3791:243a-2: sangs rgyas la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i dad ba med pas na thabs la mi mkhas pa'o //
T03D3791:243a-3: phan pa'i dngos po la sogs pa'i dran ba dang
T03D3791:243a-4: bral bas na sdig pa'i grogs po la brten pa'o
T03D3791:243a-5: // 'dis ni 'di skad du gang gi phyir dad
T03D3791:243a-6: pa la sogs pa chen pos ni yang dag par
T03D3791:243a-7: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par sla la /
T03D3791:243a-8: de dag nyid chung ngus rtogs par dka'o zhes bya
T03D3791:243a-9: ba'i shugs kyis na 'bring ba rnams kyis ni rang
T03D3791:243a-10: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rtogs pa yin la /
T03D3791:243a-11: chung ngu rnams kyis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub
T03D3791:243a-12: rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di don gyis 'phangs pa
T03D3791:243a-13: yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:243a-15: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnon po yis //
T03D3791:243a-16: rtogs bla rtul bos rtogs dkar bzhed //
T03D3791:243a-18: don dam pa'i bden pa la brten nas 'byung bar
T03D3791:243a-19: dka' ba nyid rnam par bzlog pa ni gang bcom
T03D3791:243a-20: ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du zhes bya ba la
T03D3791:243a-21: sogs pa gsol pa yin te /
T03D3791:243a-22: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni spong ba ste ma lags so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3791:243a-23: ji ltar na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
T03D3791:243a-24: bya ba cung zad kyang med snyam pa'i dogs ba
T03D3791:243a-25: de ci'i slad du zhen zhes bya bas bsu nas
T03D3791:243a-26: / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol ba yin no //
T03D3791:243a-27: stong pa lags pa'i slad du zhes bya ba ni
T03D3791:243a-28: ma skyes pa lags pa'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par
T03D3791:243a-29: byang chub par bya ba'i chos ni ma mchis so

T03D3791:318b-39: de ltar yin du chug na rtag tu thugs rdze
T03D3791:318b-40: chen po'i rang bzhin can chos kyi sku la bzhugs
T03D3791:318b-41: pa na rtag tu srog chags mtha' dag gi don
T03D3791:318b-42: ji ltar mi mdzad ce na /
T03D3791:318b-43: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sogs pa dang phrad bas
T03D3791:318b-44: sngon skyed pa'i dge ba'i sa bon sangs rgyas la
T03D3791:318b-45: sogs ba la dmigs pa'i rgyu yongs su brtas par
T03D3791:318b-46: gyur pa na sems can gang la dus gang gi
T03D3791:318b-47: tshe chos bstan ba la sogs pa mdzad pas yun
T03D3791:318b-48: du phan par 'gyur ba de'i tshe de'i don bya

T03D3791:319a-3: ngo bo la sogs pa sa bon du mi rung

T03D3791:319a-8: pa la sogs pa bzang po thob par mi 'gyur
T03D3791:319a-9: ro zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
T03D3791:319a-11: rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur nas //

T03D3791:319a-13: gang tshe bya ba phan gyur ba //
T03D3791:319a-14: de dang de la der snang ngo //
T03D3791:319a-15: lha yi rgyal pos char phab kyang //
T03D3791:319a-16: sa bon mi rung mi 'khrungs ltar //
T03D3791:319a-17: sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur kyang //
T03D3791:319a-18: skal ba med pas bzang mi myong //
T03D3791:319a-20: de ltar ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis thams
T03D3791:319a-21: cad du snang ba'i sgo nas don gyi mdzad pa

T03D3791:319a-27: de bas na ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi

T03D3791:319a-29: rten la yod pa skad cig ma re re la

T03D3791:319a-31: bya zhes kyang bsam par mi bya'o //

T03D3791:319a-34: sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod //
T03D3791:319a-35: de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir //
T03D3791:319a-36: rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin //
T03D3791:319a-38: de'i 'og tu mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis
T03D3791:319a-39: dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par

T03D3791:319a-42: pa chen po'i chos kyi longs spyod kyi dga' ba
T03D3791:319a-43: dang bde ba shin tu kha na ma thob med
T03D3791:319a-44: pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir gsum pa longs
T03D3791:319a-45: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin te /

T03D3791:319b-2: mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T03D3791:319b-3: dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di //
T03D3791:319b-4: theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
T03D3791:319b-5: thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed //
T03D3791:319b-7: yang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gang yin zhe na /
T03D3791:319b-8: 'di lta ste bla ma rnams la skyel ba dang
T03D3791:319b-9: bsu ba la sogs pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i
T03D3791:319b-10: mtshan dang ldan pa nyid dang /

T03D3791:319b-31: lta bu dang / pa nyid dang / skye bo

T03D3791:320a-17: phra ma'i tshig spangs pas tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba nyid dang /

T03D3791:320a-19: khong khro ba la sogs ba med par bltas pas rdzim pa'i lta bu nyid do //

T03D3791:320a-22: phyag dang zhabs sor dra bas 'brel pa dang //
T03D3791:320a-23: phyag dang zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags //
T03D3791:320a-24: 'di yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang //
T03D3791:320a-25: sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang //
T03D3791:320a-26: zhabs 'bur mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs //
T03D3791:320a-27: byin pa ae n+ya ya 'dra'i phyag ring mdzes //
T03D3791:320a-28: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog / pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang //
T03D3791:320a-29: spu ni re re nas g-yas legs 'khrungs dang //
T03D3791:320a-30: zhal mdzod spus brgyan sku stod seng ge 'dra //
T03D3791:320a-31: 'di yi dpung pa'i mgo zlum phrag pa rgyas //
T03D3791:320a-32: 'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang //
T03D3791:320a-33: sku ni n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab //
T03D3791:320a-34: gtsug tor dbur ldan ljags ring mdzes pa dang //

T03D3791:320b-0: shin tu dkar dang tshems mnyam thags @320b bzang dang //

T03D3791:320b-3: 'di la mtshan ni gang gang gi / sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin //

T03D3791:320b-12: sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid de //

T03D3791:320b-17: 'du byed thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral ba

T03D3791:320b-29: bar mdzad pa nyid kyis zhabs mi mnyam pa med
T03D3791:320b-30: pa nyid dang / mi zil gyis gnon pa la

T03D3791:321a-0: / mdzes par mkhas pa nyid kyis mdzes par @321a * //

T03D3791:322a-13: shin tu rgyas pa nyid dang /

T03D3791:322a-15: nyid kyis dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa nyid
T03D3791:322a-16: dang / mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya
T03D3791:322a-17: ba'i bag la nyal spangs pa nyid kyis dbu skra
T03D3791:322a-19: bstan pa blo 'jam pos yongs su shes pa nyid kyis dbu skra 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03D3791:322a-20: thugs 'dod chags la sogs pas ma 'khrugs pa nyid kyis dbu skra ma 'dzings pa nyid dang /
T03D3791:322a-21: rtag tu tshig mi rtsub pa nyid kyis dbu skra mi bshor ba nyid dang /
T03D3791:322a-22: byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog bkram pa nyid kyis dbu skra dri zhim pa nyid dang /
T03D3791:322a-23: rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par gyur pa nyid
T03D3791:322a-24: kyis phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis
T03D3791:322a-25: pa dang g-yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa nyid yin
T03D3791:322a-27: thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang //
T03D3791:322a-28: mdog snum mtho dang sen mo rnams //
T03D3791:322a-29: zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang //
T03D3791:322a-30: rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa med //
T03D3791:322a-31: long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang //
T03D3791:322a-32: seng ge glang chen bya dang ni //
T03D3791:322a-33: khyu mchog stabs gshegs g-yas phyogs dang /
T03D3791:322a-34: mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags //
T03D3791:322a-36: gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku //
T03D3791:322a-37: mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
T03D3791:322a-38: sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang //
T03D3791:322a-39: gom snyoms spyan ni dag pa dang //
T03D3791:322a-40: shin tu gzhon mdog can nyid dang //
T03D3791:322a-41: sku zhum med dang rgyas ba dang //
T03D3791:322b-0: @322b shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang //
T03D3791:322b-1: yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang //
T03D3791:322b-2: gzigs pa sgrib med dag pa dang //
T03D3791:322b-3: dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang //
T03D3791:322b-4: phyang nge ba dang lte ba ni //
T03D3791:322b-5: zab dang g-yas phyogs 'khyil pa dang //
T03D3791:322b-6: kun nas blta na sdug pa dang //
T03D3791:322b-7: kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni //
T03D3791:322b-8: sme ba gnag bag med pa dang //
T03D3791:322b-9: phyag ni shing bal ltar 'jam dang //
T03D3791:322b-10: phyag ris mdangs yod zab ring dang //
T03D3791:322b-11: zhal ni ha cang mi ring dang //
T03D3791:322b-12: mchu ni bim pa ltar dmar dang //
T03D3791:322b-13: ljags mnyen pa dang srab pa dang //
T03D3791:322b-14: dmar dang 'brug gi sgra nyid dang //
T03D3791:322b-15: gsung mnyen 'jam dang mche ba zlum //
T03D3791:322b-16: rno dang dkar dang mnyam pa dang //
T03D3791:322b-17: byin gyis phra dang shangs mtho dang //
T03D3791:322b-18: mchog tu dag pa dag dang ni //
T03D3791:322b-19: spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug / pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang //
T03D3791:322b-20: smin tshugs ring dang 'jam pa dang //
T03D3791:322b-21: snum dang sbu ni mnyam pa dang //
T03D3791:322b-22: phyag ring rgyas dang snyan mnyam dang //
T03D3791:322b-23: nyams pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
T03D3791:322b-25: dbyes che ba dang dbu rgyas dang //
T03D3791:322b-26: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag dang //
T03D3791:322b-28: mi bshor skyes bu yid 'phrog dang //
T03D3791:322b-29: dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis ni //
T03D3791:322b-30: g-yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa ste //
T03D3791:322b-31: sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed //
T03D3791:322b-33: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa
T03D3791:322b-34: la sogs pa'i sku gang gis 'khor ba ji srid
T03D3791:322b-35: par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can
T03D3791:322b-36: rnams kyi 'dod pa'i don mnyam pa nyid du mdzad
T03D3791:322b-37: pa'i sku de ni rgyun chags pa nyid kyis sangs
T03D3791:322b-38: rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sbrul pa'i sku rgyun mi
T03D3791:322b-39: 'chad par byis pa'i skye bo thams cad dang thun
T03D3791:322b-40: mong du gyur pa bzhi pa yin par shes par
T03D3791:322b-42: gang gi srid pa ji srid par //
T03D3791:322b-43: 'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag ;
T03D3791:322b-44: / mnyam du mdzad pa'i sku de ni //
T03D3791:322b-45: thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad //
T03D3791:322b-47: de la dang por 'gro ba bzang po dang bzang
T03D3791:322b-48: po ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pas gnas
T03D3791:322b-49: pa med pa'i mtshan nyid 'gro ba rab tu zhi
T03D3791:323a-0: sbyin pa la sogs pa bsdu ba'i dngos @323a * //
T03D3791:323a-2: thos pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i shes pas
T03D3791:323a-3: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dor ba dang
T03D3791:323a-4: blang bar bya ba'i sgo nas rtogs par mdzad nas
T03D3791:323a-5: sgyu ma mkhan bzhin du rjes su chags pa la
T03D3791:323a-6: sogs pas rnam par dben pa nyid kyis sems can
T03D3791:323a-7: gyi don de gzhan gyi don byas pa la sogs
T03D3791:323a-8: pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba'i bdag nyid la bkod
T03D3791:323a-9: de / de'i rjes la rang gi don 'khor gsum
T03D3791:323a-10: rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol
T03D3791:323a-11: tu phyin pa drug goms pa la'o //
T03D3791:323a-12: de'i 'og tu rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi mtshan
T03D3791:323a-13: nyid sangs rgyas kyi lam ste dge ba bcu'i las
T03D3791:323a-14: kyi lam la'o // de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid goms pa la'o //
T03D3791:323a-15: de'i rjes la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3791:323a-16: la brten nas sa dang po chos kyi dbyings kun
T03D3791:323a-17: tu 'gro ba rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis su med
T03D3791:323a-18: pa'i chos la'o // de nas tshogs yongs su rdzogs
T03D3791:323a-19: pa'i rgyur gyur pas gnyis pa la sogs par tshul
T03D3791:323a-20: khrims la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos
T03D3791:323a-21: thams cad brdar btags pa'i shes pa la 'god do
T03D3791:323a-22: pa'i chos la'o // // de bzhin du rim gyis
T03D3791:323a-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten
T03D3791:323a-24: nas sa drug pa shes pa dang shes bya'i dngos
T03D3791:323a-25: por mngon par ma zhen pa'i mtshan nyid chos thams
T03D3791:323a-26: cad dmigs su med pa la'o //
T03D3791:323a-27: de'i 'og tu sa bdun pa la thabs kyi pha
T03D3791:323a-28: rol tu phyin pa'i stobs kyis sems can yongs su
T03D3791:323a-30: de nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs
T03D3791:323a-31: kyis sa brgyad pa la nyan thos la sogs pa
T03D3791:323a-32: dang thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3791:323a-33: lam la'o // de nas yang de nyid la chos
T03D3791:323a-34: thams cad la mngon par zhen pa spangs pa la'o
T03D3791:323a-35: lam la'o // // de'i rjes las dgu pa la
T03D3791:323a-36: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthus byang
T03D3791:323a-38: de'i 'og tu ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3791:323a-39: pa'i stobs kyis sa bcu pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T03D3791:323a-40: sna tshogs pa rnam par dag pa la bkod nas
T03D3791:323a-41: yang de nyid la skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i
T03D3791:323a-42: rang gi ngo bo yang dag pa'i byang chub tu
T03D3791:323a-44: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi don dang /
T03D3791:323b-0: 'jig @323b rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas
T03D3791:323b-1: kyi drung du 'gro ba la sogs pa'i yon tan
T03D3791:323b-2: la bkod de / de lta bu'i rim pa yang
T03D3791:323b-3: de nyid la khyad par gyi lam gyi rang gi
T03D3791:323b-4: ngo bo byang chub mtha' dag 'dren par byed pa'i
T03D3791:323b-5: chos kyi mtshan nyid byang chub kyi yan lag dang
T03D3791:323b-6: la bkod de / / las dang 'bras bur 'brel pa chud mi za ba dang /
T03D3791:323b-7: dngos po thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa dang /
T03D3791:323b-8: phyin ci log thams cad spangs pa dang /
T03D3791:323b-9: phyin ci log gi gzhi med pa spangs pa'i ye shes dang /
T03D3791:323b-10: rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid byang
T03D3791:323b-11: chub sems dpa'i rnam par byang ba dang dri ma
T03D3791:323b-12: thams cad dang bral ba'i rnam par byang ba'i rgyu'i
T03D3791:323b-13: tshogs dang / stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
T03D3791:323b-14: kyis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas tha mi dad
T03D3791:323b-15: par yongs su shes pa la bkod nas de bzhin
T03D3791:323b-16: gshegs pa'i sa la mya ngan las 'da' ba la
T03D3791:323b-18: de ltar kun rdzob tu longs spyod rdzogs pa la
T03D3791:323b-19: sogs pa'i sku la sogs par snang ba bskyed pa'i
T03D3791:323b-20: sgo nas don bya ba byed pas na de'i bdag
T03D3791:323b-21: po las gdul bya'i skye bo'i snang ba la brten
T03D3791:323b-22: pa 'di las rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bdun chos
T03D3791:323b-23: kyi sku bzhin du 'khor ba ji srid du 'byung
T03D3791:323b-24: bas na mdzad ba rnams chos kyi sku'i yin par
T03D3791:323b-25: bzhed do zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
T03D3791:323b-29: 'gro rnams zhi pa'i las dang ni //
T03D3791:323b-30: bsdu rnam bzhi la 'god pa dang //
T03D3791:323b-31: kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yi //
T03D3791:323b-32: rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang //
T03D3791:323b-33: sems can rnams don ji bzhin gyi //
T03D3791:323b-34: don dang pha rol phyin drug dang //
T03D3791:323b-35: sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyis //
T03D3791:323b-36: stong pa nyid dang gnyis zad dang //
T03D3791:323b-37: brda dang dmigs pa med pa dang //
T03D3791:323b-38: lus can rnams ni yongs smin dang //
T03D3791:323b-39: byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ni //
T03D3791:323b-40: mngon par zhen pa bzlog pa dang //
T03D3791:323b-41: byang chub thob dang sangs rgyas zhing //
T03D3791:323b-42: rnam par dag dang nges pa dang //
T03D3791:323b-43: sems can don dang tshad med dang //
T03D3791:323b-44: sangs rgyas rten sogs yon tan dang //
T03D3791:323b-45: byang chub yan lag las rnams ni //
T03D3791:323b-46: chud mi za dang bden mthong dang //
T03D3791:323b-47: phyin ci log ni spangs pa dang //
T03D3791:323b-48: de gzhi med pa'i tshul dang ni //
T03D3791:324a-3: tha dad yongs su mi shes dang //
T03D3791:324a-5: chos kyi sku yi phrin las ni //
T03D3791:324a-6: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du bzhed //
T03D3791:324a-8: de ltar rab tu byed pa'i bstan bcos tshad mar
T03D3791:324a-9: gyur pa nyid kyis dgongs pa rnams shugs kyi sbyor
T03D3791:324a-10: ba la sogs pa'i tshig la sogs pas mngon par
T03D3791:324a-12: rjes su mthun par gzhung gi don brjod par bya ba yin no //
T03D3791:324a-13: de bas na kha cig mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan
T03D3791:324a-14: gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las gsungs pa las phal
T03D3791:324a-15: cher gzhan du byas nas rab 'byor byang chub sems
T03D3791:324a-16: dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
T03D3791:324a-17: brtsams te / ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3791:324a-18: dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3791:324a-19: phyin pa las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de
T03D3791:324a-20: bzhin du khyod spobs par byos shig ces bya ba
T03D3791:324a-21: nas brtsams te yum 'di'i spyi dang yan lag gi
T03D3791:324a-22: don legs par ma 'brel par brjod pas bshad pa
T03D3791:324a-23: byas pa gang yin pa de ni dam pa rnams
T03D3791:324a-24: kho nas mkhyen par mdzad par rigs pa yin pas
T03D3791:324a-25: 'dir bdag gis sun dbyung ba'i nye bar dgad pa
T03D3791:324a-26: brtsams te / ma byas so / shes rab kyi
T03D3791:324a-27: pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa mngon par rtogs
T03D3791:324a-28: pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba las rjes su rig par
T03D3791:324a-29: bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu
T03D3791:324a-30: brtsams te / ma byas so / pa'o / //
T03D3791:324a-31: / ji skad du bshad pa'i mngon par rtogs pa
T03D3791:324a-32: brgyad kyi rang bzhin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3791:324a-33: tu phyin pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi
T03D3791:324a-34: sbyor ba'i gtam gyi sgo nas las dang po pa'i
T03D3791:324a-35: gnas skabs nas brtsams te tshol ba'i rim pa ston
T03D3791:324a-36: pa ni rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba la
T03D3791:324a-37: sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T03D3791:324a-38: byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu du ni byang chub
T03D3791:324a-39: kyi sems yang dag par blangs pa dang sbyin pa
T03D3791:324a-40: la sogs pa'i dge ba bsags pa dang ldan pa
T03D3791:324a-41: yin te sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid yin pa'i
T03D3791:324a-42: phyir dang / dmigs pa spong ba don du gnyer
T03D3791:324a-43: ba nyid yin pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshogs kyi sa
T03D3791:324a-44: la gnas pa yin pas de gong nas gong du
T03D3791:324a-45: nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag la sogs pa'i gdams
T03D3791:324a-46: ngag tshol ba la brtson pa yin par mngon la
T03D3791:324b-0: da ltar ni sa bcu @324b pa'i dbang phyug nyid
T03D3791:324b-1: phyir dang / yin no // lus la ched cher
T03D3791:324b-2: mi byed ces bya ba ni rus pa dang rkang
T03D3791:324b-3: la sogs pa sbyin par sems pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:324b-4: srog la mi lta zhes bya ba ni snying sbyin par spro ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:324b-5: rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa
T03D3791:324b-6: dag la zhes bya ba de la rnyed pa ni
T03D3791:324b-8: / bkur sti ni mang du gces bar byed pa nyid do //
T03D3791:324b-9: tshigs su bcad pa ni grags pas phyogs kun du khyab pa'o //
T03D3791:324b-10: tshogs kyi sa la dang por /
T03D3791:324b-11: de tshe chos kyi rgyun la ni //
T03D3791:324b-12: sangs rgyas rnams las zhi gnas dang //
T03D3791:324b-13: ye shes yangs pa thob bya'i phyir //
T03D3791:324b-14: gdams ngag rgya chen thob par 'gyur //
T03D3791:324b-15: zhes gsungs pas chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin
T03D3791:324b-16: ma thob pa nyid kyis na bar snang la sgra
T03D3791:324b-17: thos par gyur pa yin no //
T03D3791:324b-18: g-yon du ma lta bar zhes bya ba ni g-yon logs su'o //
T03D3791:324b-19: shar du ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3791:324b-20: ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi char ma yin
T03D3791:324b-21: pa'o // ci nas bdag las ma g-yos shing 'jig
T03D3791:324b-22: tshogs las kyang ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba
T03D3791:324b-24: bdag la sogs pa mi snang ba rnams ni yod pa nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:324b-25: gzugs la sogs pa mthong ba'i lam du gnas pa
T03D3791:324b-26: bdag med pa rnams ni med pa nyid du rtogs
T03D3791:324b-27: pa'i phyir ci nas de rnams las ma g-yos pa
T03D3791:324b-28: de ltar song shig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go
T03D3791:324b-29: // nyams par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ldog par 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3791:324b-30: ting nge 'dzin gyi gags byed pa lus kyi ngal
T03D3791:324b-31: du ba la sogs pa bskyed pa 'gog pa 'di
T03D3791:324b-32: thams cad kyis ni nye bar mtshon pa'i sgo nas
T03D3791:324b-33: 'di skad du ting nge 'dzin nyid thams cad la
T03D3791:324b-34: le lo dang / dmigs pa brjed pa dang //
T03D3791:324b-37: de bzhin du mi rtsol ba dang /
T03D3791:324b-38: yang rtsol ba zhes bya ba nyes pa drug po
T03D3791:324b-39: rnams kyi gnyen po spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad dang
T03D3791:324b-40: ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi shes rab kyi pha
T03D3791:324b-41: rol tu phyin pa yid la byed cing shar phyogs
T03D3791:324b-42: su song shig / de ltar na de thos par
T03D3791:324b-43: 'gyur ro zhes gdams ngag byin pa yin te /
T03D3791:324b-44: 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan la mngon
T03D3791:324b-45: par yid ches pa'i dad pas rnal 'byor pa'i 'dun
T03D3791:324b-47: de nas 'dug pa'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
T03D3791:325a-1: brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa bskyed do //
T03D3791:325a-2: de nas lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs ba las le lo ldog par 'gyur te /
T03D3791:325a-3: de bas na dad pa la sogs pa bzhi ni le lo spong ba'i don du 'gyur ro //
T03D3791:325a-4: dran pa ni dmigs pa brjed pa'i gnyen po yin
T03D3791:325a-5: te des dmigs pa la yang dag par 'jog pa'i
T03D3791:325a-6: phyir ro // shes bzhin ni zhum pa dang rgod pa'i gnyen po yin te /
T03D3791:325a-7: des rab tu dga' ba'i dngos po sangs rgyas la
T03D3791:325a-8: sogs pa'i yon tan yid la byed pas ni bying
T03D3791:325a-9: ba spong la / skyo ba'i dngos po mi rtag
T03D3791:325a-10: pa la sogs pa yid la byed pas ni rgod
T03D3791:325a-11: pa spong bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:325a-12: zhum pa dang rgod pa rab tu ma zhi ba'i
T03D3791:325a-13: dus su ni mi rtsol ba nyes pa yin pas
T03D3791:325a-14: de'i gnyen por sems pa la goms par byed pa
T03D3791:325a-15: yin no // zhum pa dang rgod pa zhi bar
T03D3791:325a-16: gyur nas gang gi tshe sems dmigs pa las mi
T03D3791:325a-17: g-yo zhing mngon par 'du byed pa med par rang
T03D3791:325a-18: gi ngang gis 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang
T03D3791:325a-19: rtsol ba nyes pa yin te //
T03D3791:325a-20: des sems rnam par g-yeng ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3791:325a-21: des na de'i gnyen por btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o zhes brjod pa yin no //
T03D3791:325a-22: gdams ngag yang dag par thob pas na khas blangs
T03D3791:325a-23: pa'i don du de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so
T03D3791:325a-24: // khas len 'di ni rigs pa dang ni ldan
T03D3791:325a-25: pa nyid yin no snyom pa'i dogs pa de ci'i
T03D3791:325a-26: phyir zhe na zhes bya bas bsu nas /

T03D3791:340a-19: phyug dam pa thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi
T03D3791:340a-20: sku can khyod kyis legs par gsungs pa'i gsungs 'di
T03D3791:340a-21: ni legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pas mngon
T03D3791:340a-22: par bstod do zhes bya ba bstod par gyur to
T03D3791:340a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa
T03D3791:340a-25: mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba las yongs
T03D3791:340a-26: su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa
T03D3791:340a-28: / mdor bsdus la sogs tshig brjod la mkhas gsung rab kun la mnga' mdzad pa //
T03D3791:340a-29: 'dren byed rnams kyi rtogs don de nyid lam kun gang phyir de lta bur //
T03D3791:340a-30: gsal bar mdzad pa de nyid las ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin pa'i //
T03D3791:340a-31: tshul la khyad par shes bya 'di ni gsung gi bdag nyid tsam du zad //
T03D3791:340a-32: 'phags pa thogs med gzhung gi rjes 'brangs blo bzang ser sna med rnams dang //
T03D3791:340a-33: mkhyen ldan mang du gsan pa dang ldan bla ma rnam par snang mdzad bzang po yi //
T03D3791:340a-34: mthu yis blo gsal cung zhig skyes pas seng ge bzang po zhes bya bas //
T03D3791:340a-35: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das yum 'di yi don gsal rnam pa kun tu gus pas byas //
T03D3791:340a-36: yang dag yang dag ma yin rnam dbye'i rigs bral shes pa skyes las kun rdzob tu //
T03D3791:340a-37: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam du yid bying skye bzhir 'gyur ba'i lus can 'di dag kun //
T03D3791:340b-0: @340b yum gyi bshad sbyar byas pa las byung bdag gis thob pa'i dge ba'i sa bon las //
T03D3791:340b-1: rnam pa kun gyi mchog tu gyur pa'i sku ni
T03D3791:340b-2: gsum po nges par thob par shog / rdzogs sangs
T03D3791:340b-3: sras bcas rnams kyis legs par rnam phye yum 'di'ang
T03D3791:340b-5: blo nor phun tshogs yul min de bzhin tshig gi spyod yul min bdag gang na ste //
T03D3791:340b-6: bdag ni phyi nas skye ba gzhan du rtag tu
T03D3791:340b-7: rmongs pa nyid du ma gyur cig / snyam du
T03D3791:340b-8: bsams nas 'di byas pa las mkhas rnams kyis ni
T03D3791:340b-10: phrag dog zug rdus gdungs pa'i yid can log pa'i nga rgyal stabs bsgrubs thos pa yis //
T03D3791:340b-11: shes rab ldan pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par byed pa'i nus pa yod min te //
T03D3791:340b-12: dam min skye bo rnams dang dam ba'i bar ni sa 'og dang ni mkha' ltar ring //
T03D3791:340b-13: de nyid phyir na rnam pa de 'dras bdag la gnod 'gyur phra mo 'ga' yang med //
T03D3791:340b-14: gang zhig sa stengs bsod nams grangs tshogs ldan par rab grags mkhas pa'i skye bos brgyan //
T03D3791:340b-15: yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas dpal ldan t'i ka du ka'i gtsug lag khang bzangs der //
T03D3791:340b-16: sbyin las 'byor pa chen po thob 'gyur chos kyi bdag nyid snying rje lha yi ni ;
T03D3791:340b-17: / mgon bcas bde ba'i rkyen gzhi mkhas pa'i gnas gyur khang pa dag tu gnas bcas nas //
T03D3791:340b-18: glang chen khros pa'i klad pa rnam par 'gems byed nus pa dang ldan bdag nyid can //
T03D3791:340b-19: bsod nams la sbyangs brtson pa las byung phun tshogs rnams ni kun tu sbyor gyur pa //
T03D3791:340b-20: rgyal po mchog brgyud pa rgyud rgyal rigs nas 'khrungs rgyal po dpal ldan chos skyong ring la ni //
T03D3791:340b-21: dka' 'grel bzang po de nyid snang ba zhes bya 'di ni bdag gis rnam par brtsams //
T03D3791:340b-22: mngon rtogs kyi ni rgyan gang yin //
T03D3791:340b-23: de gsal byed pa'i snang ba ni //
T03D3791:340b-24: shes rab pha rol phyin rnams bshad dge 'byung de ni rdzogs pa yin //
T03D3791:340b-25: mkhas pa mkhas pa ma yin rnams //
T03D3791:340b-26: lhag chad dogs pa yod gyur na //
T03D3791:340b-27: gzhung 'di'i tshad kyi nges pa ni //
T03D3791:340b-28: yum 'di yi ni mtshan nyid yin //
T03D3791:340b-29: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T03D3791:340b-30: bshad pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi de kho
T03D3791:341a-2: mkhas pa chen po slob dpon seng ge bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T03D3791:341a-4: // / sngon gyi smon lam bsod nams tshogs bsags rgyus //
T03D3791:341a-5: lha rigs byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud du grags //
T03D3791:341a-6: sa stengs rgyal po'i rgyal po nyid gyur ba //
T03D3791:341a-7: dpal gyis brgyan cing skyon med gnas su 'khrungs //
T03D3791:341a-8: gnag dag grags pa zla zer lta bu yis //
T03D3791:341a-9: sa stengs kun tu rnam par mdzes gyur cing //
T03D3791:341a-10: mdzad spyod phun sum tshogs yon tan kun gyis brgyan //
T03D3791:341a-11: mi dbang sa yi bdag po lha lder grags //
T03D3791:341a-12: skyes chen des ni bod khams 'gro ba kun //
T03D3791:341a-13: sangs rgyas 'bras thob par gyi phan bzhed de //
T03D3791:341a-14: rgyal yum don gsal bya phyir rab 'bad pas //
T03D3791:341a-15: yongs snyoms chos kyi sbyin bdag chen po mdzad //
T03D3791:341a-16: don 'di sgrub phyir dga' bas thag rings nas //
T03D3791:341a-17: gsol btab rgyu yis rgyal po'i rigs su grags //
T03D3791:341a-18: dga' byed rgyud byung legs bshad dpal zhes bya'i //
T03D3791:341a-19: thos mangs mkhas pa'i grags thob bdag gis bshad //
T03D3791:341a-20: sgra skad tha snyad la byang brtson par ldan //
T03D3791:341a-21: rin chen sgron 'dra'i rin chen bzang po yis //
T03D3791:341a-22: gtsang dge yon tan du ma'i byung gnas gyur /
T03D3791:341a-23: rgyal sa'i dam pa bu rangs gnas su bsgyur //
T03D3791:341a-24: snying rjes gzhan la phan pa gtsor byas te //
T03D3791:341a-25: rtogs sla thun mong rang skad byas pa las //
T03D3791:341a-26: bsod nams rgya chen 'dir ni gang bsags des //
T03D3791:341a-27: 'jig rten mtha' dag byang chub mchog thob shog /
T03D3791:341a-28: dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag bod kyi lha btsan
T03D3791:341a-29: po khri bkra shis lde btsan gyi bkas /
T03D3791:341a-30: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bh'a shi ta dang /
T03D3791:341a-31: sgra bsgyur byi lo ts'a ba chen po / dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur nas /
T03D3791:341a-32: slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta chen po d'i pi ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T03D3791:341a-33: zhu zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba chen po dge
T03D3791:341a-34: slong rin chen bzang pos yul dbus kyi dpe dang
T03D3791:341a-35: yang gtugs nas bcos shing zhus te gtan la phab
T03D3791:341a-36: pa las / de nas dus phis pandi ta chen
T03D3791:341a-37: po gzhung 'bum phrag gnyis kyis mgrin pa brgyan pa
T03D3791:341a-38: dhi ra p'a la zhes bya ba dang /
